Full Entry: 賤 jiàn, *dzans, vst, 1 ‘be cheap; base, mean, low’, a itr: 吾少也賤 (LY 9.6); b caus: 我將罪賤之 (Mo 13); 民不貴學問，又不賤農 (SJS 2); c mod: 君命 召，雖賤人，大夫士必自御之 (Li 1); 2 nc, ‘base, low things/people’: 以道觀之，物無貴賤 (Zhuang 17). Ant. 貴 [152.8].
Definitions: 1 ‘be cheap; base, mean, low’, a itr: 吾少也賤 (LY 9.6); b caus: 我將罪賤之 (Mo 13); 民不貴學 問，又不賤農(SJS 2); c mod: 君命 召，雖賤人，大夫士必自御之 (Li 1); 2 nc, ‘base, low things/people’: 以道觀 之，物無貴賤 (Zhuang 17). Ant. 貴 [152.8].

Full Entry: 鬼 guǐ, *kwəiʔ, nc, 1 ‘ghost, spirit, demon’: 致孝乎鬼神(LY 8.21); 2 vi, ‘behave like a ghost’, itr: 故明主之行制也天，其用人也鬼 (HFei 48). Note: Whereas 鬼 (perhaps related to 歸, hence ‘revenant’) is the most general word for ghosts (of deceased people), 神 [113.5] often refers to righteous spirits, descending from heaven, that bestow rewards or mete out punishments.
Definitions: 1 ‘ghost, spirit, demon’: 致孝乎鬼神 (LY 8.21); 2 vi, ‘behave like a ghost’, itr: 故明主之行制也 天，其用人也鬼 (HFei 48). Note: Whereas 鬼 (perhaps related to 歸, hence ‘revenant’) is the most general word for ghosts (of deceased people), 神 [113.5] often refers to righteous spirits, descending from heaven, that bestow rewards or mete out punishments.

Full Entry: 怨 yuàn, *ʔons, nc, 1 ‘anger; hatred, resentment’: 以德報怨...何以報德 (LY 14.34); 2 vn, ‘hate; express resentment’, a tr: 鄭伯怨王 (Zuo 1.3); 民怨其上，不遂 亡者，未之有也 (SY 3); b itr: 詩...可以 怨 (LY 17.9); 樂不樂者， 其民必怨 (Lü 5.3); c mod (!): 國無怨民曰強國 (SJS 4).
Definitions: 1 ‘anger; hatred, resentment’: 以德報怨...何以報德 (LY 14.34); 2 vn, ‘hate; express resentment’, a tr: 鄭伯怨王(Zuo 1.3); 民怨其上，不遂 亡者，未之有也 (SY 3); b itr: 詩...可以 怨 (LY 17.9); 樂不樂者， 其民必怨 (Lü 5.3); c mod (!): 國無怨民曰強國 (SJS 4).

Full Entry: 貫 guàn, *kôns, vtr, ‘pierce, penetrate; string together’, a tr: 予一以貫之 (LY 15.3); b mod， ‘successive’: 若夫貫日而 治詳，一日而曲列之 (Xun 11); 端如貫 珠 (Li 19).
Definitions: ‘pierce, penetrate; string together’, a tr: 予一以貫之 (LY 15.3); b mod， ‘successive’: 若夫貫日而 治詳，一日而曲列之 (Xun 11); 端如貫 珠 (Li 19).

Full Entry: 鐸 duó, *lâk, nc, ‘bell’: 天將以夫子為 木鐸 (LY 3.24). Note: 鐸 are bronze bells with a clapper, probably used in the military; other types of bells include the 鐘, sets of which were suspended from wooden racks and struck with mallets to play ritual music, and the larger 鎛, which was individually suspended.
Definitions: ‘bell’: 天將以夫子為 木鐸 (LY 3.24). Note: 鐸 are bronze bells with a clapper, probably used in the military; other types of bells include the 鐘, sets of which were suspended from wooden racks and struck with mallets to play ritual music, and the larger 鎛, which was individually suspended.

Full Entry: 什 shí, *gip, nc, ‘group of ten; squad (of ten soldiers)’: 使有什伯之器而不用 (Lao 80).
Definitions: ‘group of ten; squad (of ten soldiers)’: 使有什伯之器而不用 (Lao 80).

Full Entry: 寐 mèi,*mis,vn,‘sleep’,itr:吾聞之，喜 而不寐 (Meng 6B13); 獻公為之不寐 (CQFL 14).
Definitions: ‘sleep’,itr:吾聞之，喜 而不寐 (Meng 6B13); 獻公為之不寐 (CQFL 14).

Full Entry: 盍 hé, *gâp, adv [< 胡不], ‘why not? how not?’, as encouragement: 二子盍相 與觀乎南山之陽有木焉 (SY 3.6); 盍致 地焉 (SJ 47). Cf. 胡 [130.5] and Box 16.
Definitions: ‘why not? how not?’, as encouragement: 二子盍相 與觀乎南山之陽有木焉 (SY 3.6); 盍致 地焉 (SJ 47). Cf. 胡[130.5] and Box 16.

Full Entry: 昆 kūn, *kûn, nc, ‘elder brother’: 吾不 與子為昆弟矣(HFei 23); a later (dialectal?) syn. of 兄 [10.3]. Ant. 弟[57.4].
Definitions: ‘elder brother’: 吾不 與子為昆弟矣 (HFei 23); a later (dialectal?) syn. of 兄 [10.3]. Ant. 弟 [57.4].

Full Entry: 胡 hú, *gâ, adv, ‘how, why’: 成而行 之，胡可壅也 (GY 1.3). Syn. 何 [9.5], 奚 [37.7]; cf. also 盍 [108.5].
Definitions: ‘how, why’: 成而行 之，胡可壅也 (GY 1.3). Syn. 何[9.5], 奚 [37.7]; cf. also 盍 [108.5].

Full Entry: 交 jiāo, *krâu, vn, 1 ‘mingle, associate with, exchange’, a itr: 與朋友交而不信乎 (LY 1.4); b tr: 士無賢不肖皆謙而禮交之 (SJ 77); 2 adv, ‘mutually, one another’: 上 下交征利，而國危矣 (Meng 1A1); 周鄭 交惡 (Zuo 1.3).
Definitions: 1 ‘mingle, associate with, exchange’, a itr: 與朋友交而不信乎 (LY 1.4); b tr: 士無賢不肖皆謙而禮交之 (SJ 77); 2 adv, ‘mutually, one another’: 上 下交征利，而國危矣(Meng 1A1); 周鄭 交惡 (Zuo 1.3).

Full Entry: 信 xìn, *sin, nc, 1 ‘trust; trustworthiness, reliability, faithfulness’: 小所以事大，信 也 (Zuo 9.8); 將者智信仁勇嚴也 (Sun 1); 期果言當謂之信，反信為慢 (XS 8.3); 2 vst, ‘be sincere, trustworthy, truthful’, a itr: 與朋友交而不信乎 (LY 1.4); b caus, ‘[consider trustworthy >] trust’: 吾斯之未 能信 (LY 5.6); ‘make trustworthy’; 設法度 以齊民，信賞罰以盡民能 (HFei 48); ant. 疑 [103.9]; 3 adv, ‘truly, indeed’: 水信 無分於東西 (Meng 6A2). Syn. 誠 [149.6].
Definitions: 1 ‘trust; trustworthiness, reliability, faithfulness’: 小所以事大，信 也 (Zuo 9.8); 將者智信仁勇嚴也 (Sun 1); 期果言當謂之信，反信為慢 (XS 8.3); 2 vst, ‘be sincere, trustworthy, truthful’, a itr: 與朋友交而不信乎 (LY 1.4); b caus, ‘[consider trustworthy >] trust’: 吾斯之未 能信 (LY 5.6); ‘make trustworthy’; 設法度 以齊民，信賞罰以盡民能 (HFei 48); ant. 疑 [103.9]; 3 adv, ‘truly, indeed’: 水信無分於東西 (Meng 6A2). Syn. 誠 [149.6].

Full Entry: 遊 yóu, *ju, vn, ‘stroll, go for a walk; travel, wander’, itr: 父母在，不遠遊 (LY 4.19); 孔子西遊於衛 (Zhuang 14); 莊子與惠子遊於濠梁之上 (Zhuang 17).
Definitions: ‘stroll, go for a walk; travel, wander’, itr: 父母在，不遠遊 (LY 4.19); 孔子西遊於衛 (Zhuang 14); 莊子 與惠子遊於濠梁之上 (Zhuang 17).

Full Entry: 罰 fá, *bat, vn, 1 ‘punish, fine’, tr: 上為政 者得則罰之 (Mo 17); 2 nc ‘penalty, fine’: 掌受士之金罰貨罰，入于司兵 (ZL 69); 重罰輕賞，則上愛民，民死上 (SJS 4). Cf. note at 刑[18.4]; ant. 賞 [154.8].
Definitions: 1 ‘punish, fine’, tr: 上為政 者得則罰之 (Mo 17); 2 nc ‘penalty, fine’: 掌受士之金罰貨罰，入于司兵 (ZL 69); 重罰輕賞，則上愛民，民死上 (SJS 4). Cf. note at 刑[18.4]; ant. 賞 [154.8].

Full Entry: 祭 jì, *tsets, vn, 1 ‘sacrifice’, 祭者， 所以 追養繼孝也 (Li 25); a itr: 祭如在 (LY 3.12); 祭於公，不宿肉 (LY 10.8); b tr with Oi: 祭神如神在 (LY 3.12); 死葬之以禮，祭 之以禮 (LY 2.5); 罷兵休卒，收養昆 弟，共祭先祖 (Zhuang 29); 2 nc, ‘sacrifice, offering’: 使民如承大祭 (LY 12.2).
Definitions: 1 ‘sacrifice’, 祭者， 所以 追養繼孝也 (Li 25); a itr: 祭如在 (LY 3.12); 祭於公，不宿肉 (LY 10.8); b tr with Oi: 祭神如神在 (LY 3.12); 死葬之以禮，祭 之以禮 (LY 2.5); 罷兵休卒，收養昆 弟，共祭先祖 (Zhuang 29); 2 nc, ‘sacrifice, offering’: 使民如承大祭 (LY 12.2).

Full Entry: 廢 fèi, *pats, vtr, ‘abandon, discard, cast aside, dismiss’, a tr: 君子不以言舉人，不 以人廢言 (LY 15.23); b pass: 聲則非雅聲 者舉廢 (Xun 9); 鄉飲酒之禮廢，則長幼之序失 (Li 26); c mod: 是故民無廢事，而 國無失利也(Guan 73). Cf. 乏 [4.4].
Definitions: ‘abandon, discard, cast aside, dismiss’, a tr: 君子不以言舉人，不 以人廢言 (LY 15.23); b pass: 聲則非雅聲 者舉廢 (Xun 9); 鄉飲酒之禮廢，則長幼 之序失 (Li 26); c mod: 是故民無廢事，而 國無失利也 (Guan 73). Cf. 乏[4.4].

Full Entry: 俱 jù/jū, *ko, adv, ‘both, all; together, jointly, likewise’: 父母俱存 (Meng 7A20); 雖與之俱學， 弗若之矣 (Meng 6A9); 孔子墨子俱道堯舜 (HFei 50); 其俱是 也，其俱非也邪(Zhuang 2).
Definitions: ‘both, all; together, jointly, likewise’: 父母俱存 (Meng 7A20); 雖與之俱學， 弗若之矣 (Meng 6A9); 孔子墨子俱道堯舜 (HFei 50); 其俱是 也，其俱非也邪 (Zhuang 2).

Full Entry: 兩 liǎng, *raŋʔ, vi, 1 ‘be two, double, both’, a itr: 心未嘗不兩也 (Xun 21); b caus, ‘double, make/have two’: 一國而兩 君，一國不可理也，一家而兩父，一 家不可理也(Guan 23); 行有進退，而 力不能兩也 (Guan 53); 2 adv, ‘twice; both, as a pair’: 冬與夏不能兩刑，草與 稼不能兩成 (Lü 24.5); 力不能兩護，故 棄妾之子 (LNZ 5.6); 今君高拱而兩有 之 (SJ 69). Cf. Box 3 and note at 二 [7.0].
Definitions: 1 ‘be two, double, both’, a itr: 心未嘗不兩也 (Xun 21); b caus, ‘double, make/have two’: 一國而兩 君，一國不可理也，一家而兩父，一 家不可理也 (Guan 23); 行有進退，而 力不能兩也 (Guan 53); 2 adv, ‘twice; both, as a pair’: 冬與夏不能兩刑，草與 稼不能兩成 (Lü 24.5); 力不能兩護，故 棄妾之子 (LNZ 5.6); 今君高拱而兩有 之 (SJ 69). Cf. Box 3 and note at 二 [7.0].

Full Entry: 草 cǎo,*tshûʔ,nc,‘grass,herbs’:草上之 風，必偃 (LY 12.19).
Definitions: ‘grass,herbs’:草上之 風，必偃 (LY 12.19).

Full Entry: 稼 jià, *krâh, nc, ‘crops’: 冬與夏不能 兩刑，草與稼不能兩成 (Lü 24.5).
Definitions: ‘crops’: 冬與夏不能 兩刑，草與稼不能兩成 (Lü 24.5).

Full Entry: 始 shǐ, *lhəʔ, ntemp, 1 ‘beginning’, a ini: 始吾於人也，聽其言而信其行 (LY 5.11); b head: 無名天地之始 (Lao 1); 2 vi ‘begin, start’, a itr: 征商，自此賤丈夫始 矣 (Meng 2B10); 吾欲為難，安始而可 (GY 7.6); b caus: 無始亂，無怙富(Zuo 11.4); 昔者其父始之，我終之 (GY 14.9); 3 adv, ‘initially, first’: 吾始聞之懼 (Zhuang 14); 于是始作八卦 (Yi 8). Ant. 卒 [24.6], 終 [120.5].
Definitions: 1 ‘beginning’, a ini: 始吾於人也，聽其言而信其行 (LY 5.11); b head: 無名天地之始 (Lao 1); 2 vi ‘begin, start’, a itr: 征商，自此賤丈夫始 矣 (Meng 2B10); 吾欲為難，安始而可 (GY 7.6); b caus: 無始亂，無怙富 (Zuo 11.4); 昔者其父始之，我終之 (GY 14.9); 3 adv, ‘initially, first’: 吾始聞之懼 (Zhuang 14); 于是始作八卦 (Yi 8). Ant. 卒[24.6], 終 [120.5].

Full Entry: 怠 dài, *ləʔ̂ , vi, ‘be slack, negligent, indifferent; impolite’, a itr: 得時無怠，時 不再來 (GY 21.6); 往觀終日，怠於政事 (SJ 47); b caus, ‘neglect, disregard’: 父母舅姑之命，勿逆勿怠 (Li 12).
Definitions: ‘be slack, negligent, indifferent; impolite’, a itr: 得時無怠，時 不再來 (GY 21.6); 往觀終日，怠於政事 (SJ 47); b caus, ‘neglect, disregard’: 父母 舅姑之命，勿逆勿怠(Li 12).

Full Entry: 惑 huò,*wə̂k,vi,‘beindoubt,unsure, confused’, a itr: 四十而不惑 (LY 2.4); 余甚惑焉， 儻所謂天道， 是邪非邪 (SJ 61); b caus: 惑主敗法，以亂士民 (HFei 11).
Definitions: ‘beindoubt,unsure, confused’, a itr: 四十而不惑 (LY 2.4); 余甚惑焉， 儻所謂天道， 是邪非邪 (SJ 61); b caus: 惑主敗法，以亂士民 (HFei 11).

Full Entry: 幹 gàn,*kâns,nc,‘stem,framework’:禮 國之幹也，敬禮之輿也 (Zuo 5.11).
Definitions: ‘stem,framework’:禮 國之幹也，敬禮之輿也 (Zuo 5.11).

Full Entry: 源/原 yuán, *ŋwan, nc, ‘source, origin’: 不璋兩原則刑乃繁 (Guan 1).
Definitions: ‘source, origin’: 不璋兩原則刑乃繁 (Guan 1).

Full Entry: 惠 huì,*wîs,nc,1‘kindness,benevolence, favor’: 分人以財謂之惠 (Meng 3A4); 君 子懷刑，小人懷惠 (LY 4.11); 心省恤人 謂之惠，反惠為困 (XS 8.3); 2 vi, ‘be thoughtful, kind, benevolent’, a itr: 惠而不 知為政 (Meng 4B4); 不惠於其父乎 (GY 7.8); b caus: 天下之人，皆歸其德而惠其 義 (Guan 57); c pseudo-tr: 庶人駭政，則 莫若惠之 (Xun 9); 夫豈惠其民 (GY 7.8); d mod: 惠人也 (LY 14.9); 3 np, 莊子與惠子遊於濠梁之上 (Zhuang 17); as posth. name,‘Benevolent’: 秦惠王曰 (Lü 1.5).
Definitions: 1‘kindness,benevolence, favor’: 分人以財謂之惠 (Meng 3A4); 君 子懷刑，小人懷惠 (LY 4.11); 心省恤人 謂之惠，反惠為困 (XS 8.3); 2 vi, ‘be thoughtful, kind, benevolent’, a itr: 惠而不 知為政 (Meng 4B4); 不惠於其父乎 (GY 7.8); b caus: 天下之人，皆歸其德而惠其 義(Guan 57); c pseudo-tr: 庶人駭政，則 莫若惠之 (Xun 9); 夫豈惠其民 (GY 7.8); d mod: 惠人也 (LY 14.9); 3 np, 莊子與惠子 遊於濠梁之上 (Zhuang 17); as posth. name,‘Benevolent’: 秦惠王曰 (Lü 1.5).

Full Entry: 鳴 míng,*mreŋ,vi,‘crow,caw,moo,cry’, a itr: 牛鳴於門外(HFei 20); b caus, ‘sound’: 小子鳴鼓而攻之，可也 (LY 11.17); c mod: 前有塵埃，則載鳴鳶 (Li 1). Note: 鳴 is a generic word used to describe the sound of diverse animals: birds, chicken, cattle, frogs, cicadas, etc., as well as that of drums and bells. Only for dogs, 吠 [30.4] is used instead.
Definitions: ‘crow,caw,moo,cry’, a itr: 牛鳴於門外 (HFei 20); b caus, ‘sound’: 小子鳴鼓而攻之，可也 (LY 11.17); c mod: 前有塵埃，則載鳴鳶 (Li 1). Note: 鳴 is a generic word used to describe the sound of diverse animals: birds, chicken, cattle, frogs, cicadas, etc., as well as that of drums and bells. Only for dogs, 吠 [30.4] is used instead.

Full Entry: 窺 kuī, *khwe, vn ‘spy, peek (at/ through)’, a itr: 不窺於牖而知天道 (Lü 17.2); b tr: 窺敵觀變欲潛以深 (Xun 15).
Definitions: spy peek (at/ through)’, a itr: 不窺於牖而知天道 (Lü 17.2); b tr: 窺敵觀變欲潛以深 (Xun 15).

Full Entry: 牖 yǒu, *luʔ/juʔ, nc, ‘window’: 不出於 戶而知天下，不窺於牖而知天道 (Lü 17.2).
Definitions: ‘window’: 不出於 戶而知天下，不窺於牖而知天道 (Lü 17.2).

Full Entry: 巨/鉅 jù, *gaʔ, vst, 1 ‘be large, great; mighty, powerful’, a itr: 大國之樹必巨 (SY 12); 宜鉅者鉅，宜小者小 (SJ 23); b comp: 齊臨菑十萬戶...巨於長安 (SJ 52); c mod: 於是使力士舉巨囊 (GYang 12.6); 2 adv: 國者，巨用之則大，小用之則小 (Xun 11). Syn. 大 [37.0]; ant. 小 [42.0]; dist. 臣[131.0].
Definitions: 1 ‘be large, great; mighty, powerful’, a itr: 大國之樹必巨(SY 12); 宜鉅者鉅，宜小者小 (SJ 23); b comp: 齊臨菑十萬戶...巨於長安 (SJ 52); c mod: 於是使力士舉巨囊(GYang 12.6); 2 adv: 國者，巨用之則大，小用之則小(Xun 11). Syn. 大 [37.0]; ant. 小 [42.0]; dist. 臣 [131.0].

Full Entry: 荊 Jīng, *kreŋ, np, alt. name of 楚 [75.9].
Definitions: alt. name of 楚 [75.9].

Full Entry: 腹 fù, *puk, nc, ‘belly’: 實其腹 (Lao 3); 燕王必當殺子，刳子腹及子之腸矣 (ZGC 31.2). Cf. 胃 [130.5].
Definitions: ‘belly’: 實其腹 (Lao 3); 燕王必當殺子，刳子腹及子之腸矣 (ZGC 31.2). Cf. 胃 [130.5].

Full Entry: 骨 gǔ, *kût, nc, ‘bone’: 弱其志，強其 骨 (Lao 3).
Definitions: ‘bone’: 弱其志，強其 骨 (Lao 3).

Full Entry: 親 qīn, *tshin, nc, 1 ‘kin, relatives; parents’: 莫不尊親 (Li 31); 2 vst, ‘be intimate, close to’, a itr: 父與夫孰親 (Zuo 2.2); b caus, ‘treat as close; be affectionate towards; care for’:鬼神非人實親，惟德 是依 (Zuo 5.5); 君子賢其賢而親其親 (Li 42); syn. 暱 [72.11].
Definitions: 1 ‘kin, relatives; parents’: 莫不尊親 (Li 31); 2 vst, ‘be intimate, close to’, a itr: 父與夫孰親 (Zuo 2.2); b caus, ‘treat as close; be affectionate towards; care for’:鬼神非人實親，惟德 是依 (Zuo 5.5); 君子賢其賢而親其親 (Li 42); syn. 暱 [72.11].

Full Entry: 衛 Wèi, *wes, np, a polity: 鄭人以王師 虢師伐衛南鄙 (Zuo 1.1). Note: Wei (often written Wey to distinguish it from Wei 魏), located in the area of southern Hebei and northern Henan, was given as a fief to a brother of King Wu in the eleventh century bc in order to rule over several former Shang lineages. Originally an important polity, Wei lost significance in Chunqiu and Zhanguo times, until it was annihilated by Wei 魏 in 254 bc.
Definitions: a polity: 鄭人以王師 虢師伐衛南鄙 (Zuo 1.1). Note: Wei (often written Wey to distinguish it from Wei 魏), located in the area of southern Hebei and northern Henan, was given as a fief to a brother of King Wu in the eleventh century bc in order to rule over several former Shang lineages. Originally an important polity, Wei lost significance in Chunqiu and Zhanguo times, until it was annihilated by Wei 魏 in 254 bc.

Full Entry: 穆 mù, *muk, nc, 1 ‘ancestor’, first, third, fifh, etc. in sacrificial order: 王季之 穆也 (Zuo 5.5); 2 np, ‘Splendid’, a posth. name: 九月衛穆公卒 (Zuo 8.2).
Definitions: 1 ‘ancestor’, first, third, fifh, etc. in sacrificial order: 王季之 穆也 (Zuo 5.5); 2 np, ‘Splendid’, a posth. name: 九月衛穆公卒 (Zuo 8.2).

Full Entry: 丁 dīng, *têŋ, ntemp, 4th of the ‘Heavenly stems’: 秋八月丁卯，大事于大廟 (Zuo 6.2). Cf. Focus 8.
Definitions: 4th of the ‘Heavenly stems’: 秋八月丁卯，大事于大廟(Zuo 6.2). Cf. Focus 8.

Full Entry: 卯 mǎo, *mrûʔ, ntemp, fourth of the ‘Earthly branches’: 秋八月丁卯，大事于 大廟 (Zuo 6.2). Cf. Focus 8.
Definitions: fourth of the ‘Earthly branches’: 秋八月丁卯，大事于大廟 (Zuo 6.2). Cf. Focus 8.

Full Entry: 疾 jí,*dzit,vst,1‘beill,sick;suffer’,aitr: 昔者疾，今日愈(Meng 2B11); b caus, ‘think ill of, wish ill, hate’: 百姓疾之 (Xun 10); 夫子疾由之為仁義乎 (HFei 34); c mod: 上醫醫國，其次疾人 (GY 14.17); 2 nc, ‘ailment, pain, disease’: 吾王庶幾無疾 病與 (Meng 1B1). Syn. 病 [104.5].
Definitions: 1‘beill,sick;suffer’,aitr: 昔者疾，今日愈 (Meng 2B11); b caus, ‘think ill of, wish ill, hate’: 百姓疾之 (Xun 10); 夫子疾由之為仁義乎 (HFei 34); c mod: 上醫醫國，其次疾人(GY 14.17); 2 nc, ‘ailment, pain, disease’: 吾王庶幾無疾病與 (Meng 1B1). Syn. 病 [104.5].

Full Entry: 疾 jí, *dzit, vst, ‘be quick, fast; industrious; intense’, a itr: 疾則苦而不入 (Zhuang 13); 然則往速徠疾 (SJS 2); 我疾農，先實公倉 (SJS 3); b comp: 順風而 呼，聲非加疾也，而聞者彰 (Xun 1); 2 adv: 疾諷誦，謹司聞 (Lü 4.3). Syn. 速[162.7]; ant. 徐 [60.7]; 遲 [162.12].
Definitions: ‘be quick, fast; industrious; intense’, a itr: 疾則苦而不入 (Zhuang 13); 然則往速徠疾 (SJS 2); 我疾 農，先實公倉 (SJS 3); b comp: 順風而 呼，聲非加疾也，而聞者彰(Xun 1); 2 adv: 疾諷誦，謹司聞 (Lü 4.3). Syn. 速[162.7]; ant. 徐 [60.7]; 遲 [162.12].

Full Entry: 愈 yù, *loʔ, vst, 1 ‘be better, superior’, a itr: 女與囘也孰愈 (LY 5.9); esp. of diseases, ‘get better’: 昔者疾，今日愈 (Meng 2B11); b caus, ‘increase’: 愈疏，不 孝也 (Meng 6A3); c comp: 丹之治水也 愈於禹 (Meng 6B11); 法雖不善，猶愈 於無法 (Shen 1); d pseudo-tr: 思天下惟 羿為愈己 (Meng 4B24); 2 adv, ‘increasingly, more’, expressing the comp of vst: 身 貴而愈恭，家富而愈儉，勝敵而愈戒(Xun 8). Cf. Box 24.
Definitions: 1 ‘be better, superior’, a itr: 女與囘也孰愈 (LY 5.9); esp. of diseases, ‘get better’: 昔者疾，今日愈 (Meng 2B11); b caus, ‘increase’: 愈疏，不 孝也 (Meng 6A3); c comp: 丹之治水也 愈於禹 (Meng 6B11); 法雖不善，猶愈 於無法 (Shen 1); d pseudo-tr: 思天下惟 羿為愈己 (Meng 4B24); 2 adv, ‘increasingly, more’, expressing the comp of vst: 身 貴而愈恭，家富而愈儉，勝敵而愈戒(Xun 8). Cf. Box 24.

Full Entry: 既/旣 jì,*kəs,vi,1‘finish;befinished, done’, a itr: 萬物之情既矣 (HNan11); b caus: 吾與汝既其文， 未既其實(Zhuang 7); 2 adv, ‘already’: 今周德既衰 (Zuo 5.24); cf. 10.4; 3 conj ‘when, after, since’: 君既定矣，又何求 (Zuo 11.4); cf. 16.3.
Definitions: 1‘finish;befinished, done’, a itr: 萬物之情既矣(HNan11); b caus: 吾與汝既其文， 未既其實 (Zhuang 7); 2 adv, ‘already’: 今周德既衰 (Zuo 5.24); cf. 10.4; 3 conj ‘when, after, since’: 君既定矣，又何求 (Zuo 11.4); cf. 16.3.

Full Entry: 既而 jì'ér, *kəs-nə, conj, ‘afterwards, later on’: 既而與為公介 (Zuo 7.2); 楚子 賜之金，既而悔之 (Zuo 5.18); cf. 16.3.
Definitions: ‘afterwards, later on’: 既而與為公介 (Zuo 7.2); 楚子 賜之金，既而悔之 (Zuo 5.18); cf. 16.3.

Full Entry: 衰 shuāi, *srui, vn, ‘decay, decline, diminish’, only itr: 今周德既衰 (Zuo 5.24); 彌子色衰愛弛 (HFei 12); 氣衰則生 物不遂(Li 19). Ant. 興 [134.9], 盛 [108.6].
Definitions: ‘decay, decline, diminish’, only itr: 今周德既衰 (Zuo 5.24); 彌子色衰愛弛 (HFei 12); 氣衰則生 物不遂(Li 19). Ant. 興 [134.9], 盛 [108.6].

Full Entry: 猶 yóu,*ju,vn,1cop,‘belike’:性猶湍水 也 (Meng 6A2); 2 adv, ‘still, yet’: 當堯之 時，天下猶未平 (Meng 3A4); cf. 10.5; 2 conj. ‘but, but still, yet’: 雖亡子，猶不亡 族 (Zuo 6.16); 民猶以為小也 (Meng 2B12); ‘if even’: 臣猶知之，而況君乎 (GY 10.1); cf. 16.2.
Definitions: 1cop,‘belike’:性猶湍水 也 (Meng 6A2); 2 adv, ‘still, yet’: 當堯之 時，天下猶未平 (Meng 3A4); cf. 10.5; 2 conj. ‘but, but still, yet’: 雖亡子，猶不亡 族 (Zuo 6.16); 民猶以為小也 (Meng 2B12); ‘if even’: 臣猶知之，而況君乎(GY 10.1); cf. 16.2.

Full Entry: 夷 Yí, *ləi, np, a non-Chinese people: 雖 之夷狄，不可棄也 (LY 13.19). Note: The foreign people whose lands bordered on the North China plain were considered by the Chinese as uncivilized ‘barbarians’; the term 四夷subsumed the ‘barbarians’ in the four cardinal directions: the Yi 夷 to the east, the Rong 戎 to west, the Di 狄 to the north, and the Man 蠻 to the south.
Definitions: a non-Chinese people: 雖 之夷狄，不可棄也 (LY 13.19). Note: The foreign people whose lands bordered on the North China plain were considered by the Chinese as uncivilized ‘barbarians’; the term 四夷subsumed the ‘barbarians’ in the four cardinal directions: the Yi 夷 to the east, the Rong 戎 to west, the Di 狄 to the north, and the Man 蠻 to the south.

Full Entry: 終 zhōng, *tuŋ, vtr, 1 ‘end, finish, complete’, a tr: 雖終其業，其去之必速 (Li 18); 終身也者，非終父母之身，終其 身也 (Li 12), b pass, ‘be finished; die’: 今君 雖終，言猶在耳(Zuo 6.7); ant. 始 [38.5]; cf. note at 死 [78.2]; c mod, typically with ntemp, ‘the whole’: 吾嘗終日不食， 終夜不寢 (LY 15.31); with nc: 子路終身誦之 (LY 9.27); 2 adv, ‘always’: 昔者孟子嘗與 我言於宋，於心終不忘 (Meng 3A2).
Definitions: 1 ‘end, finish, complete’, a tr: 雖終其業，其去之必速 (Li 18); 終身也者，非終父母之身，終其 身也 (Li 12), b pass, ‘be finished; die’: 今君 雖終，言猶在耳 (Zuo 6.7); ant. 始 [38.5]; cf. note at 死 [78.2]; c mod, typically with ntemp, ‘the whole’: 吾嘗終日不食， 終夜 不寢 (LY 15.31); with nc: 子路終身誦之 (LY 9.27); 2 adv, ‘always’: 昔者孟子嘗與 我言於宋，於心終不忘 (Meng 3A2).

Full Entry: 留 liú,*ru,vi,‘stay,remain’,aitr:願留而 受業於門 (Meng 6B2); 辛請留於趙以觀 之 (XX 2.15); b caus, ‘retain, hold back, stop, hinder’: 寧其死為留骨而貴乎 (Zhuang 17); 孟子謝，遂留其婦 (LNZ 1.11); 君行矣，無留吾事 (XX 7.1); c pseudo-tr: 地辟舉則民留處 (Guan 1).
Definitions: ‘stay,remain’,aitr:願留而 受業於門 (Meng 6B2); 辛請留於趙以觀 之 (XX 2.15); b caus, ‘retain, hold back, stop, hinder’: 寧其死為留骨而貴乎 (Zhuang 17); 孟子謝，遂留其婦 (LNZ 1.11); 君行矣，無留吾事 (XX 7.1); c pseudo-tr: 地辟舉則民留處 (Guan 1).

Full Entry: 寢 qǐn ,*tshəmʔ,vi,1‘sleep,rest’,aitr:吾 嘗終日不食， 終夜不寢 (LY 15.31); b caus, ‘put to rest’: 今一日飲酒，而三日寢之 (Yan 1.3); c mod: 必有寢衣，長一 身有半 (LY 10.5); 見寢石以為伏虎也 (Xun 21); 2 nc,‘private room, bedroom’: 寢 門闢矣 (Zuo 7.2); cf. note at 室 [40.6].
Definitions: 1‘sleep,rest’,aitr:吾 嘗終日不食， 終夜不寢 (LY 15.31); b caus, ‘put to rest’: 今一日飲酒，而三日 寢之 (Yan 1.3); c mod: 必有寢衣，長一 身有半 (LY 10.5); 見寢石以為伏虎也 (Xun 21); 2 nc,‘private room, bedroom’: 寢 門闢矣 (Zuo 7.2); cf. note at 室 [40.6].

Full Entry: 睹 dǔ, *tâʔ, vn, ‘see’, tr: 臣不睹臣之母 三年矣 (Lü 9.5); 未睹巧之久也 (Sun 2). Syn. 見 [147.0].
Definitions: ‘see’, tr: 臣不睹臣之母 三年矣 (Lü 9.5); 未睹巧之久也(Sun 2). Syn. 見 [147.0].

Full Entry: 微 wēi, *məi, conj, ‘if not, unless; if it were not for, without’: 微君言，臣故將 謁之 (HFei 36); 微禹，吾其魚乎(Zuo 10.1); 微二子者，楚不國矣 (Zuo 12.16). Cf. 15.4.1.
Definitions: ‘if not, unless; if it were not for, without’: 微君言，臣故將 謁之 (HFei 36); 微禹，吾其魚乎 (Zuo 10.1); 微二子者，楚不國矣 (Zuo 12.16). Cf. 15.4.1.

Full Entry: 微 wéi,*məi,vst,‘beimperceptible,hidden, inconspicuous, subtle’, a itr: 世衰道 微，邪說暴行有作(Meng 3B9); b caus: 白公奔山而縊，其徒微之 (Zuo 12.16); c comp: 精微乎毫毛 (Xun 26); d mod: 季桓 子微服往觀再三 (SJ 47). Syn. 妙 [38.4].
Definitions: ‘beimperceptible,hidden, inconspicuous, subtle’, a itr: 世衰道 微，邪說暴行有作 (Meng 3B9); b caus: 白公奔山而縊，其徒微之 (Zuo 12.16); c comp: 精微乎毫毛(Xun 26); d mod: 季桓 子微服往觀再三 (SJ 47). Syn. 妙[38.4].

Full Entry: 服 fú, *bək, nc, 1 ‘clothes; mourning clothes’: 晨往，寢門闢矣，盛服將朝 (Zuo 7.2); 2 vn, ‘wear’, a tr: 齊桓公好服紫，一國盡服紫 (HFei 32); b itr: 蘭芷不 為莫服而不芳(Wen 6).
Definitions: 1 ‘clothes; mourning clothes’: 晨往，寢門闢矣，盛服將朝 (Zuo 7.2); 2 vn, ‘wear’, a tr: 齊桓公好服 紫，一國盡服紫 (HFei 32); b itr: 蘭芷不 為莫服而不芳 (Wen 6).

Full Entry: 服 fú,*bək,vi,‘comply,submit,serve’,a itr: 東西南北，莫敢不服 (ZGC 11.5); 人 之情心服於德，不服於力 (Wen 4); b caus, ‘subdue’: 人君不能服強敵，破大 國也 (SJS 3); c pseudo-tr: 上服度則六親 固 (Guan 1).
Definitions: ‘comply,submit,serve’,a itr: 東西南北，莫敢不服 (ZGC 11.5); 人 之情心服於德，不服於力 (Wen 4); b caus, ‘subdue’: 人君不能服強敵，破大 國也 (SJS 3); c pseudo-tr: 上服度則六親 固 (Guan 1).

Full Entry: 燭 zhú, *tok, nc, 1 ‘torch, candle’: 夜行以 燭，無燭則止(Li 12); 以人魚膏為燭 (SJ 6); 2 vn,‘shine on, illuminate’, tr: 燭之以日月 之明 (Zhuang 14); 日月無私燭也 (Lü 1.5).
Definitions: 1 ‘torch, candle’: 夜行以 燭，無燭則止 (Li 12); 以人魚膏為燭 (SJ 6); 2 vn,‘shine on, illuminate’, tr: 燭之以日月之明 (Zhuang 14); 日月無私燭也 (Lü 1.5).

Full Entry: 杯 bēi, *pə,̂ nc, ‘cup’, a head: 母歿而杯 圈不能飲焉 (Li 13), b as measure: 一杯水 (Meng 6A18). Cf. Box 13.
Definitions: ‘cup’, a head: 母歿而杯 圈不能飲焉 (Li 13), b as measure: 一杯水 (Meng 6A18). Cf. Box 13.

Full Entry: 束 shù, *lhok, nc, ‘bundle’, as measure: 雖有詩書，鄉一束，家一員，猶無益 於治也 (SJS 3).
Definitions: ‘bundle’, as measure: 雖有詩書，鄉一束，家一員，猶無益 於治也 (SJS 3).

Full Entry: 錦 jǐn , *kəmʔ, nc, ‘brocade’: 錦衣狐 裘，諸侯之服也 (Li 13).
Definitions: ‘brocade’: 錦衣狐 裘，諸侯之服也 (Li 13).

Full Entry: 駟 sì, *sis/slis, nc, ‘quadriga, team of four horses’: 文馬三十駟 (SJ 47).
Definitions: ‘quadriga, team of four horses’: 文馬三十駟 (SJ 47).

Full Entry: 尺 chǐ, *thak, nc, measure of length, ‘foot’, a head: 孔子長九尺有六寸 (SJ 47); b mod: 尺地莫非其有也 (Meng 2A1).
Definitions: measure of length, ‘foot’, a head: 孔子長九尺有六寸(SJ 47); b mod: 尺地莫非其有也 (Meng 2A1).

Full Entry: 選 xuǎn, *sonʔ, vn, ‘choose, select’, a tr: 於是選齊國中女子好者八十人 (SJ 47); b itr: 舜有天下，選於眾，舉皋陶(LY 12.22).
Definitions: ‘choose, select’, a tr: 於是選齊國中女子好者八十人 (SJ 47); b itr: 舜有天下，選於眾，舉皋陶 (LY 12.22).

Full Entry: 宮 gōng, *kuŋ, nc, ‘residence, abode’: 故 宮室可得而居也 (Xun 9); esp. ‘palace’: 古 之王者，擇天下之中而立國，擇國之 中而立宮，擇宮之中而立廟 (Lü 17.6).
Definitions: ‘residence, abode’: 故 宮室可得而居也 (Xun 9); esp. ‘palace’: 古 之王者，擇天下之中而立國，擇國之 中而立宮，擇宮之中而立廟 (Lü 17.6).

Full Entry: 凡 fán, *bam, pt, ‘generally, whenever, ineverycase’,mostlyini,awithS:凡有血 氣者，莫不尊親 (Li 31); b with exp O: 凡我國之忠信之士，我將賞貴之，不 忠信之士，我將罪賤之 (Mo 13); c with absolute topic: 凡人臣之事君也，多以 主所好事君 (SJS 14); d with num, ‘altogether’: 凡三百有六十 (Yi 7); 凡火攻有 五 (Sun 12).
Definitions: ‘generally, whenever, ineverycase’,mostlyini,awithS:凡有血 氣者，莫不尊親 (Li 31); b with exp O: 凡我國之忠信之士，我將賞貴之，不 忠信之士，我將罪賤之 (Mo 13); c with absolute topic: 凡人臣之事君也，多以 主所好事君 (SJS 14); d with num, ‘altogether’: 凡三百有六十 (Yi 7); 凡火攻有 五 (Sun 12).

Full Entry: 力 lì, *rək, nc, 1 ‘strength, force, effort’: 其馬力竭矣(Zhuang 19); 2 vn, ‘make an effort, exert oneself ’; a itr: 其從者肅而 寬，忠而能力 (Zuo 5.23); b tr: 民貧則力 富(SJS 20).
Definitions: 1 ‘strength, force, effort’: 其馬力竭矣 (Zhuang 19); 2 vn, ‘make an effort, exert oneself ’; a itr: 其從者肅而寬，忠而能力 (Zuo 5.23); b tr: 民貧則力 富 (SJS 20).

Full Entry: 閉 bì, *pît(s), vtr, ‘lock, close’, a tr: 明君 者閉其門，塞其塗 (Guan 13); b pass: 門 已閉矣 (Zuo 12.15).
Definitions: ‘lock, close’, a tr: 明君 者閉其門，塞其塗 (Guan 13); b pass: 門 已閉矣 (Zuo 12.15).

Full Entry: 姑 gū, *kâ, adv, ‘now, for a while/time being/a moment’, expresses ‘temporary’ aspect: 子姑待之 (Zuo 1.1); 若子之為人 吏，宜受上戮，子姑默矣 (YTL 24). Cf. 10.5.
Definitions: ‘now, for a while/time being/a moment’, expresses ‘temporary’ aspect: 子姑待之 (Zuo 1.1); 若子之為人吏，宜受上戮，子姑默矣 (YTL 24). Cf. 10.5.

Full Entry: 姑/家 gū, *kâ, nc, ‘father’s sister; husband’s mother’: 婦人不飾，不敢見舅姑 (Li 4); 父母舅姑之命，勿逆勿怠 (Li 12); 長鋏歸來乎，無以為家(ZGC 11.1).
Definitions: ‘father’s sister; husband’s mother’: 婦人不飾，不敢見舅姑 (Li 4); 父母舅姑之命，勿逆勿怠 (Li 12); 長鋏歸來乎，無以為家(ZGC 11.1).

Full Entry: 覺 jué,*krûk,vi,aitr,‘beaware,conscious of’: 君人者亦可以覺矣 (Xun 10); b caus, ‘make aware of, alert to’: 予將以斯道覺斯 民也， 非予覺之，而誰也 (Meng 5A7).
Definitions: aitr,‘beaware,conscious of’: 君人者亦可以覺矣 (Xun 10); b caus, ‘make aware of, alert to’: 予將以斯道覺斯民也， 非予覺之，而誰也 (Meng 5A7).

Full Entry: 覺 jiào,*krûkh,vn,‘wakeup,awaken’,a itr: 俄然覺 (Zhuang 2); b tr: 覺寢而說 (HFei 7).
Definitions: ‘wakeup,awaken’,a itr: 俄然覺 (Zhuang 2); b tr: 覺寢而說 (HFei 7).

Full Entry: 睦 mù, *mruk, vi, 1 ‘get along well, be in concord’, a itr: 吾兄弟之不協，焉能怨 諸侯之不睦 (Zuo 5.22); 諸侯方睦於晉 (Zuo 10.18); b caus: 以正君臣，以篤父 子，以睦兄弟，以和夫婦 (Li 9); 2 nc, ‘agreement, concord, understanding’: 選 賢與能，講信修睦 (Li 9). Syn. 和[30.5], 友 [29.2].
Definitions: 1 ‘get along well, be in concord’, a itr: 吾兄弟之不協，焉能怨 諸侯之不睦 (Zuo 5.22); 諸侯方睦於晉 (Zuo 10.18); b caus: 以正君臣，以篤父 子，以睦兄弟，以和夫婦 (Li 9); 2 nc, ‘agreement, concord, understanding’: 選 賢與能，講信修睦 (Li 9). Syn. 和 [30.5], 友 [29.2].

Full Entry: 誦 sòng, *s-loŋh, vn, 1 ‘declaim, recite; recount, narrate’, a tr: 誦詩三百，授之 以政，不達 (LY 13.5); 子服堯之服，誦 堯之言 (Meng 6B2); b itr: 春誦夏弦 (Li 8); 孟子少時誦 (HSWZ 9).
Definitions: 1 ‘declaim, recite; recount, narrate’, a tr: 誦詩三百，授之 以政，不達 (LY 13.5); 子服堯之服，誦 堯之言 (Meng 6B2); b itr: 春誦夏弦 (Li 8); 孟子少時誦 (HSWZ 9).

Full Entry: 甲 jiǎ,*krâp,nc,‘armour’:可使制梃以 撻秦楚之堅甲利兵矣(Meng 1A5); by extension ‘armoured soldier’: 秋九 月，晉侯飲趙盾酒，伏甲，將攻之 (Zuo 7.2).
Definitions: ‘armour’:可使制梃以 撻秦楚之堅甲利兵矣 (Meng 1A5); by extension ‘armoured soldier’: 秋九 月，晉侯飲趙盾酒，伏甲，將攻之 (Zuo 7.2).

Full Entry: 甲 jiǎ, *krâp, ntemp, first of the ‘Heavenly stems’: 是故春三月，以甲乙之日發五 政 (Guan 40). Cf. Focus 8.
Definitions: first of the ‘Heavenly stems’: 是故春三月，以甲乙之日發五 政 (Guan 40). Cf. Focus 8.

Full Entry: 乙 yǐ, *qrət, ntemp, 2nd of the ‘Heavenly stems’: 乙丑，趙穿殺靈公於桃園 (Zuo 7.2). Cf. Focus 8.
Definitions: 2nd of the ‘Heavenly stems’: 乙丑，趙穿殺靈公於桃園(Zuo 7.2). Cf. Focus 8.

Full Entry: 戊 wù, *muh, ntemp, fifh of the ‘Heavenly stems’: 以戊己日為大黃龍一 (CQFL 74). Cf. Focus 8.
Definitions: fifh of the ‘Heavenly stems’: 以戊己日為大黃龍一(CQFL 74). Cf. Focus 8.

Full Entry: 庚 gēng, *krâŋ, ntemp, seventh of the ‘Heavenly stems’: 庚戌天王崩 (SY 19). Cf. Focus 8.
Definitions: seventh of the ‘Heavenly stems’: 庚戌天王崩 (SY 19). Cf. Focus 8.

Full Entry: 辛 xīn, *sin, ntemp, eighth of the ‘Heavenly stems’: 八月辛未，治兵，建 而不旆 (Zuo 10.13). Cf. Focus 8.
Definitions: eighth of the ‘Heavenly stems’: 八月辛未，治兵，建 而不旆 (Zuo 10.13). Cf. Focus 8.

Full Entry: 壬 rén, *nəm, ntemp, ninth of the ‘Heavenly stems’: 以壬癸殺黑龍於北方 (Mo 47). Cf. Focus 8.
Definitions: ninth of the ‘Heavenly stems’: 以壬癸殺黑龍於北方 (Mo 47). Cf. Focus 8.

Full Entry: 癸 guǐ, *kwiʔ, ntemp, tenth of the ‘Heavenly stems’: 以壬癸殺黑龍於北方 (Mo). Cf. Focus 8.
Definitions: tenth of the ‘Heavenly stems’: 以壬癸殺黑龍於北方(Mo). Cf. Focus 8.

Full Entry: 丑 chǒu, *rhuʔ/nhruʔ, ntemp, 2nd of the ‘Earthly branches’: 乙丑，趙穿殺靈公於 桃園 (Zuo 7.2). Cf. Focus 8.
Definitions: 2nd of the ‘Earthly branches’: 乙丑，趙穿殺靈公於 桃園 (Zuo 7.2). Cf. Focus 8.

Full Entry: 寅 yín, *jən/jəi, ntemp, third of the ‘Earthly branches’: 四年正月庚寅，孝公 生 (SJ 5). Cf. Focus 8.
Definitions: third of the ‘Earthly branches’: 四年正月庚寅，孝公 生(SJ 5). Cf. Focus 8.

Full Entry: 辰 chén, *dən, ntemp, fifh of the ‘Earthly branches’: 戊辰，徙濟川王王梁 (SJ). Cf. Focus 8.
Definitions: fifh of the ‘Earthly branches’: 戊辰，徙濟川王王梁 (SJ). Cf. Focus 8.

Full Entry: 巳 sì, *s-ləʔ, ntemp, sixth of the ‘Earthly branches’: 夏，四月丁巳，王入于王城 (XX 9.2). Cf. Focus 8; dist. 己[49.0], 已 [49.0].
Definitions: sixth of the ‘Earthly branches’: 夏，四月丁巳，王入于王城 (XX 9.2). Cf. Focus 8; dist. 己 [49.0], 已 [49.0].

Full Entry: 午 wǔ, *ŋâʔ, ntemp, seventh of the ‘Earthly branches’: 四月壬午，孝文太后 崩 (SJ 11). Cf. Focus 8.
Definitions: seventh of the ‘Earthly branches’: 四月壬午，孝文太后崩 (SJ 11). Cf. Focus 8.

Full Entry: 申 shēn, *lhin, ntemp, ninth of the ‘Earthly branches’: 壬申，公薨於高寢 (SY 19). Cf. Focus 8.
Definitions: ninth of the ‘Earthly branches’: 壬申，公薨於高寢 (SY 19). Cf. Focus 8.

Full Entry: 酉 yǒu, *juʔ, ntemp, tenth of the ‘Earthly branches’: 己酉，師于牛首 (Zuo 9.10). Cf. Focus 8.
Definitions: tenth of the ‘Earthly branches’: 己酉，師于牛首 (Zuo 9.10). Cf. Focus 8.

Full Entry: 戌 xū, *sut/swit, ntemp, eleventh of the ‘Earthly branches’: 庚戌天王崩 (SY 19). Cf. Focus 8.
Definitions: eleventh of the ‘Earthly branches’: 庚戌天王崩 (SY 19). Cf. Focus 8.

Full Entry: 亥 hài,*gəʔ̂ ,ntemp,twelfhofthe‘Earthly branches’: 六月丁亥，公假于大廟 (Li 25). Cf. Focus 8.
Definitions: twelfhofthe‘Earthly branches’: 六月丁亥，公假于大廟(Li 25). Cf. Focus 8.

Full Entry: 虎 hǔ,*hlâʔ,nc,1‘tiger’:虎求百獸而食 之 (ZGC 14.3); 2 np, personal name: 陽虎 務取之 (HFei 33).
Definitions: 1‘tiger’:虎求百獸而食 之 (ZGC 14.3); 2 np, personal name: 陽虎 務取之 (HFei 33).

Full Entry: 蛇 shé, *m-lai, nc, ‘snake’: 人民不勝禽 獸蟲蛇 (HFei 49).
Definitions: ‘snake’: 人民不勝禽 獸蟲蛇 (HFei 49).

Full Entry: 雞 jī, *kê, nc, ‘chicken’: 至攘人犬豕雞 豚者，其不義又甚入人園圃竊桃李 (Mo 17). Cf. note at 畜 [102.5].
Definitions: ‘chicken’: 至攘人犬豕雞 豚者，其不義又甚入人園圃竊桃李 (Mo 17). Cf. note at 畜 [102.5].

Full Entry: 狗 gǒu, *kôʔ, nc, ‘dog’: 狗，犬也 (Mo 10); 歸公乘馬， 祭服五稱， 牛羊豕雞 狗皆三百 (Zuo 4.2); 狗馬實外廄 (ZGC 11.1). Syn. 犬 [94.0]; cf. note at 畜 [102.5].
Definitions: ‘dog’: 狗，犬也 (Mo 10); 歸公乘馬， 祭服五稱， 牛羊豕雞 狗皆三百 (Zuo 4.2); 狗馬實外廄 (ZGC 11.1). Syn. 犬[94.0]; cf. note at 畜 [102.5].

Full Entry: 謂 wèi, *wəs, vtr, ‘call (s.o. sth.), refer to (sth. as); say (sth. to s.o.)’, a tr: 我之謂也 (Zhuang 17); 何謂也 (LY 4.15); b tr with C: 吾必謂之學矣 (LY 1.7); 不知軍之不 可以進，而謂之進 (Sun 3); c pass with C: 是謂聖人 (HFei 8).
Definitions: ‘call (s.o. sth.), refer to (sth. as); say (sth. to s.o.)’, a tr: 我之謂也 (Zhuang 17); 何謂也 (LY 4.15); b tr with C: 吾必謂之學矣 (LY 1.7); 不知軍之不 可以進，而謂之進(Sun 3); c pass with C: 是謂聖人 (HFei 8).

Full Entry: 司寇 sīkòu, *sə-khôh, nc, ‘minister of justice’: 孔子為魯司寇 (Meng 6B6).
Definitions: ‘minister of justice’: 孔子為魯司寇 (Meng 6B6).

Full Entry: 寇 kòu, *khôh, nc, ‘brigand, marauder’: 寇不可翫 (Zuo 5.5); 即戎寇至，傳鼓相 告 (Lü 22.3).
Definitions: ‘brigand, marauder’: 寇不可翫 (Zuo 5.5); 即戎寇至，傳鼓相 告 (Lü 22.3).

Full Entry: 戮 lù, *ruk, vtr, 1 ‘kill, execute; humiliate, disgrace’, a tr: 無罪而戮民，則士可以徙 (Meng 4B4); b pass: 俄則束乎有司，而 戮乎大市 (Xun 5); 2 nc, ‘disgrace’: 妻子為 戮 (Zuo 6.13); 為天下戮 (Lü 9.2). Note: 戮, related to 僇, ‘disgrace’, means a particularly shameful execution, including public exposure of the mutilated corpse; cf. note at 殺 [79.6].
Definitions: 1 ‘kill, execute; humiliate, disgrace’, a tr: 無罪而戮民，則士可以徙 (Meng 4B4); b pass: 俄則束乎有司，而 戮乎大市 (Xun 5); 2 nc, ‘disgrace’: 妻子為 戮 (Zuo 6.13); 為天下戮 (Lü 9.2). Note: 戮, related to 僇, ‘disgrace’, means a particularly shameful execution, including public exposure of the mutilated corpse; cf. note at 殺[79.6].

Full Entry: 令 líng, *reŋ, vi, ‘be good, fine’, only mod: 子有令聞，而美其室 (Zuo 9.15); 巧言令色，鮮矣仁 (LY 1.3).
Definitions: ‘be good, fine’, only mod: 子有令聞，而美其室 (Zuo 9.15); 巧言令色，鮮矣仁 (LY 1.3).

Full Entry: 令 líng, *reŋ, vtr, ‘cause, induce’, a tr with C: 道者，令民與上同意也 (Sun 1); 天帝令我長百獸 (XX 2.4); 臣能令君勝(SJ 65); b pass: 民無不令矣 (Lü 19.6); c pass with C: 故民可令農戰，可令游 宦，可令學問 (SJS 23). Syn. 使 [9.6].
Definitions: ‘cause, induce’, a tr with C: 道者，令民與上同意也(Sun 1); 天帝令我長百獸 (XX 2.4); 臣能令君勝 (SJ 65); b pass: 民無不令矣 (Lü 19.6); c pass with C: 故民可令農戰，可令游 宦，可令學問 (SJS 23). Syn. 使 [9.6].
BS_Gloss: 脊令 tsjek.leng (a kind of water bird)

Full Entry: 令 lìng, *reŋ(h), vn, 1 ‘order, command’, a tr: 不從其所令，從其所行 (Li 33); b itr: 上令而民知所以應 (SJS 5); 乃令於國 曰 (SY 3); 2 nc, ‘command; commander’: 惟令是視(Guan 15); 南陽無令，其誰可 而為之 (Lü 1.5). Syn. 命[30.5].
Definitions: 1 ‘order, command’, a tr: 不從其所令，從其所行 (Li 33); b itr: 上令而民知所以應 (SJS 5); 乃令於國 曰 (SY 3); 2 nc, ‘command; commander’: 惟令是視 (Guan 15); 南陽無令，其誰可 而為之 (Lü 1.5). Syn. 命 [30.5].

Full Entry: 卿 qīng, *khraŋ, nc, ‘minister’, highest rank category in the pre-imperial bureaucracy: 孟子為卿於齊 (Meng 2B6). Cf. note at 士 [33.0].
Definitions: ‘minister’, highest rank category in the pre-imperial bureaucracy: 孟子為卿於齊 (Meng 2B6). Cf. note at 士[33.0].

Full Entry: 鵬 Péng,*bəŋ̂ ,np,amythicalgiantbird: 化而為鳥，其名為鵬 (Zhuang 1).
Definitions: amythicalgiantbird: 化而為鳥，其名為鵬 (Zhuang 1).

Full Entry: 鄰 lín,*rin,nc,‘neighbour’,ahead:吾誰 與為鄰 (Zhuang 20); 德不孤，必有鄰 (Meng 1B17); b mod: 鄰國相望 (Lao 80); 攻其鄰家，殺其人民 (Mo 49).
Definitions: ‘neighbour’,ahead:吾誰 與為鄰 (Zhuang 20); 德不孤，必有鄰 (Meng 1B17); b mod: 鄰國相望 (Lao 80); 攻其鄰家，殺其人民 (Mo 49).

Full Entry: 助 zhù,*dzrah,vn,1‘help,aid,assist’:a tr: 齊人以衛師助之(Zuo 2.10); b tr with C: 予助苗長矣 (Meng 2A2); 齊助楚攻秦 (ZGC 4.1); c itr: 吾王不豫，吾何以 助 (Meng 1B4); 2 nc, ‘help, assistance’: 身 不肖而令行者，得助於眾也(HFei 40).
Definitions: 1‘help,aid,assist’:a tr: 齊人以衛師助之 (Zuo 2.10); b tr with C: 予助苗長矣 (Meng 2A2); 齊助楚攻秦 (ZGC 4.1); c itr: 吾王不豫，吾何以 助 (Meng 1B4); 2 nc, ‘help, assistance’: 身 不肖而令行者，得助於眾也 (HFei 40).

Full Entry: 苗 miáo, *mau, nc, ‘shoots, sprouts’: 予 助苗長矣 (Meng 2A2).
Definitions: ‘shoots, sprouts’: 予 助苗長矣 (Meng 2A2).

Full Entry: 嫁 jià, *krâh, vtr, ‘give [a daughter] as a wife, marry off ’, a tr: 凡諸侯嫁女，同姓 媵之，異姓則否 (Zuo 8.8); 晉獻公筮嫁 伯姬於秦 (Zuo 5.15); b pass, ‘get married’, said of women: 公女，嫁于敵國 (Zuo 2.3); 女子許嫁 (Li 1); c pseudo-tr2: 太后嫁 女諸侯 (ZGC 30.6); d mod: 共粉飾之，如嫁女床席 (SJ 126). Cf. 娶 [38.8], 妻 [38.5].
Definitions: ‘give [a daughter] as a wife, marry off ’, a tr: 凡諸侯嫁女，同姓 媵之，異姓則否 (Zuo 8.8); 晉獻公筮嫁 伯姬於秦 (Zuo 5.15); b pass, ‘get married’, said of women: 公女，嫁于敵國 (Zuo 2.3); 女子許嫁 (Li 1); c pseudo-tr2: 太后嫁 女諸侯 (ZGC 30.6); d mod: 共粉飾 之，如嫁女床席 (SJ 126). Cf. 娶 [38.8], 妻 [38.5].
BS_Gloss: go (as a bride) to one's new home

Full Entry: 獸 shòu, *hjuh, nc, 1 ‘animal, beast’: 山林 者，鳥獸之居也 (Xun 14); 2 adv, ‘like beasts’: 獸處群居(Guan 31). Cf. 禽獸 [114.8].
Definitions: 1 ‘animal, beast’: 山林 者，鳥獸之居也 (Xun 14); 2 adv, ‘like beasts’: 獸處群居(Guan 31). Cf. 禽獸 [114.8].

Full Entry: 巧 qiǎo, *khrûʔ/h, vn, 1 ‘be skilled, artful, crafty, cunning’, a itr: 昔舜巧於使 民，而造父巧於使馬 (Xun 31); 古之民 樸以厚，今之民巧以偽 (SJS 7); b tr: 多 詐則巧法令(Lü 26.3); c mod (!): 巧言令 色，鮮矣仁 (LY 1.3); 2 nc, ‘skill; skilfulness, cleverness’: 大巧若拙 (Zhuang 10); 若夫規矩勾繩，巧之具也 (Wen 6). Syn. 智 [72.8]; ant. 拙[64.5].
Definitions: 1 ‘be skilled, artful, crafty, cunning’, a itr: 昔舜巧於使民，而造父巧於使馬 (Xun 31); 古之民 樸以厚，今之民巧以偽 (SJS 7); b tr: 多 詐則巧法令 (Lü 26.3); c mod (!): 巧言令 色，鮮矣仁 (LY 1.3); 2 nc, ‘skill; skilfulness, cleverness’: 大巧若拙 (Zhuang 10); 若夫規矩勾繩，巧之具也 (Wen 6). Syn. 智 [72.8]; ant. 拙 [64.5].

Full Entry: 仞 rèn,*nəns,nc,unitoflength,approx. eight feet: 從山下望木者，十仞之木若 箸 (Xun 21).
Definitions: unitoflength,approx. eight feet: 從山下望木者，十仞之木若 箸 (Xun 21).

Full Entry: 箸 zhù, *drah, nc, ‘chopsticks’: 十仞之 木若箸 (Xun 21); 紂為象箸而箕子怖 (HFei 21).
Definitions: ‘chopsticks’: 十仞之 木若箸 (Xun 21); 紂為象箸而箕子怖 (HFei 21).

Full Entry: 貧 pín,*brən,vst,1‘bepoor’,aitr:不知 節用裕民則民貧 (Xun 10); 孔子貧且賤 (SJ 47); b caus: 無以嗜欲貧其家 (Yan 3.26); 此貧國弱兵之教也 (SJS 3); c comp: 故墨術誠行，則天下尚儉而彌貧 (Xun 10); d mod: 貧民飢餓 (Wen 10); 2 nc, ‘poverty’: 視生如死，視富如貧，視人 如豕，視吾如人(Lie 4). Dist. 貪 [154.4]; syn. 窮 [116.10], 乏 [4.4]; ant. 富[40.9].
Definitions: 1‘bepoor’,aitr:不知 節用裕民則民貧 (Xun 10); 孔子貧且賤 (SJ 47); b caus: 無以嗜欲貧其家 (Yan 3.26); 此貧國弱兵之教也 (SJS 3); c comp: 故墨術誠行，則天下尚儉而彌貧 (Xun 10); d mod: 貧民飢餓 (Wen 10); 2 nc, ‘poverty’: 視生如死，視富如貧，視人 如豕，視吾如人(Lie 4). Dist. 貪 [154.4]; syn. 窮 [116.10], 乏 [4.4]; ant. 富[40.9].

Full Entry: 黍 shǔ, *nhaʔ, nc, ‘(glutinous) millet’: 殺雞為黍而食之(LY 18.7).
Definitions: ‘(glutinous) millet’: 殺雞為黍而食之 (LY 18.7).

Full Entry: 苟 gǒu, *kôʔ, conj, ‘if, if only, if really; once’: 君苟有信，諸侯不貳，何患焉 (Zuo 10.13); 苟為後義而先利，不奪不饜 (Meng 1A1); 苟富貴，勿相忘 (SJ 48). Cf. 15.4.1–22.
Definitions: ‘if, if only, if really; once’: 君苟有信，諸侯不貳，何患焉(Zuo 10.13); 苟為後義而先利，不奪不 饜 (Meng 1A1); 苟富貴，勿相忘 (SJ 48). Cf. 15.4.1–22.

Full Entry: 合 hé, *gəp̂ , vi, ‘unite, combine; join, bring together; match’, a itr: 紇與顏氏女 野合而生孔子 (SJ 47); 心合於道，說合 於心，辭合於說 (Xun 22); b caus: 於是 乎合其州鄉朋友婚姻 (GY 18.2); 合天下 而君之 (Xun 10).
Definitions: ‘unite, combine; join, bring together; match’, a itr: 紇與顏氏女 野合而生孔子 (SJ 47); 心合於道，說合 於心，辭合於說 (Xun 22); b caus: 於是 乎合其州鄉朋友婚姻 (GY 18.2); 合天下 而君之 (Xun 10).

Full Entry: 仰 yǎng, *ŋaŋʔ, vn, ‘look up (at)’, a itr: 見橋竦焉實而仰(SY 3.6); 仰則觀象於 天，俯則觀法於地 (Yi 8); b tr: 仰之如日月，敬之如神明 (Zuo 9.14); 仰天而 歎 (SY 3). Ant. 俯[9.8].
Definitions: ‘look up (at)’, a itr: 見橋竦焉實而仰 (SY 3.6); 仰則觀象於 天，俯則觀法於地 (Yi 8); b tr: 仰之如 日月，敬之如神明 (Zuo 9.14); 仰天而 歎 (SY 3). Ant. 俯 [9.8].

Full Entry: 施 shī, *lhai, vi, 1 ‘spread out, extend’, a itr: 令聞廣譽施於身 (Meng 6A17); 德之理盡施於人 (XS 8.5); b caus, ‘bestow, apply’: 己所不欲，勿施於人 (LY 12.2); 今王發政施仁 (Meng 1A7); 施民所 善，去民所惡 (GY 19.3); 2 nc, ‘kindness, generosity’: 如有博施於民而能濟眾， 何如 (LY 6.30); 報施救患，取威定霸， 於是乎在矣 (Zuo 5.27).
Definitions: 1 ‘spread out, extend’, a itr: 令聞廣譽施於身 (Meng 6A17); 德之理盡施於人 (XS 8.5); b caus, ‘bestow, apply’: 己所不欲，勿施於人 (LY 12.2); 今王發政施仁(Meng 1A7); 施民所 善，去民所惡 (GY 19.3); 2 nc, ‘kindness, generosity’: 如有博施於民而能濟眾， 何如(LY 6.30); 報施救患，取威定霸， 於是乎在矣 (Zuo 5.27).

Full Entry: 施 yì/yí, *lai, vi, ‘spread, continue, transfer’, itr: 愛其母，施及莊公 (Zuo 1.1); 盎 於背，施於四體 (Meng 7A21); 夫施及三王而天下大駭矣 (Zhuang 11).
Definitions: ‘spread, continue, transfer’, itr: 愛其母，施及莊公 (Zuo 1.1); 盎 於背，施於四體 (Meng 7A21); 夫施及三王而天下大駭矣 (Zhuang 11).

Full Entry: 容 róng,*loŋ,nc,‘face,look;expression, countenance’: 孔子為兒嬉戲，常陳俎 豆，設禮容 (SJ 47); 舜見瞽瞍，其容有 蹙 (Meng 5A4).
Definitions: ‘face,look;expression, countenance’: 孔子為兒嬉戲，常陳俎 豆，設禮容 (SJ 47); 舜見瞽瞍，其容有 蹙 (Meng 5A4).

Full Entry: 從容 cóngróng/cōngróng, *dzoŋ-loŋ, vi, 1 ‘be carefree, untroubled, lighthearted’, itr: 儵魚出遊從容 (Zhuang 17); 2 adv: 從 容中道，聖人也 (Li 31); 坐談話，從容 言至於士(SY 11).
Definitions: 1 ‘be carefree, untroubled, lighthearted’, itr: 儵魚出遊從容 (Zhuang 17); 2 adv: 從 容中道，聖人也 (Li 31); 坐談話，從容 言至於士 (SY 11).

Full Entry: 狄/翟 Dí, *lêk, np, a non-Chinese people: 雖之夷狄，不可棄也 (LY 13.19); 夷翟遇之 (SJ 5). Cf. note at 夷 [37.3].
Definitions: a non-Chinese people: 雖之夷狄，不可棄也 (LY 13.19); 夷翟遇之 (SJ 5). Cf. note at 夷 [37.3].

Full Entry: 傲/驁 ào, *ŋâuh, vn, ‘be arrogant, haughty, contemptuous’, a itr: 故君子不 傲不隱不瞽，謹順其身(Xun 1); 生而 尊者驕，生而富者傲 (SY 3); syn. 驕 [187.12]; b tr, ‘treat with contempt’: 士驁 祿爵者，固輕其主 (Lü 15.3); 夫不忍一 世之傷，而驁萬世之患 (Zhuang 26); syn. 輕 [159.7], 慢 [61.11].
Definitions: ‘be arrogant, haughty, contemptuous’, a itr: 故君子不傲不隱不瞽，謹順其身 (Xun 1); 生而 尊者驕，生而富者傲 (SY 3); syn. 驕 [187.12]; b tr, ‘treat with contempt’: 士驁 祿爵者，固輕其主 (Lü 15.3); 夫不忍一 世之傷，而驁萬世之患 (Zhuang 26); syn. 輕 [159.7], 慢 [61.11].

Full Entry: 慢 màn, *mrâns, vn, ‘be neglectful, careless (about); disrespect’, a itr: 君使民 慢，亂將作矣(Zuo 3.8); b tr: 民慢其 政，國之患也 (Zuo 3.28); syn. 傲 [9.11], 輕 [159.7]; c mod (!): 夫人知極，鮮有慢 心 (GY 7.6).
Definitions: ‘be neglectful, careless (about); disrespect’, a itr: 君使民 慢，亂將作矣(Zuo 3.8); b tr: 民慢其 政，國之患也(Zuo 3.28); syn. 傲 [9.11], 輕 [159.7]; c mod (!): 夫人知極，鮮有慢 心 (GY 7.6).

Full Entry: 蝴蝶/胡蝶 húdié, *gâ-lêp, nc, 1 ‘butterfly’: 昔者莊周夢為胡蝶 (Zhuang 2); cf. Focus 9; 2 vi, ‘be (like) a butterfly’, itr: 栩栩然胡蝶也 (Zhuang 2).
Definitions: 1 ‘butterfly’: 昔者莊周夢為胡蝶 (Zhuang 2); cf. Focus 9; 2 vi, ‘be (like) a butterfly’, itr: 栩栩然胡蝶也 (Zhuang 2).

Full Entry: 麒麟 qílín, *gə-rin, nc, a mythical animal, ‘unicorn’: 麒麟之於走獸，鳳凰之 於飛鳥，. . . 類也 (Meng 2A2).
Definitions: a mythical animal, ‘unicorn’: 麒麟之於走獸，鳳凰之 於飛鳥，. . . 類也 (Meng 2A2).

Full Entry: 召 zhào, *drauh, vn, ‘call (for), summon; invite’, a tr: 王召士季 (GY 2.7); 使 吏召諸民當償者(ZGC 11.1); b itr: 佛肸召，子欲往 (LY 17.6).
Definitions: ‘call (for), summon; invite’, a tr: 王召士季 (GY 2.7); 使吏召諸民當償者(ZGC 11.1); b itr: 佛肸 召，子欲往 (LY 17.6).

Full Entry: 歸 guī,*kwəi,vi,1‘return’,aitr:行而不 知歸，失家者也 (Lie 1); 取國子以歸於 吳 (Mo 49); b caus: 不如歸尸以內攻之(Lü 15.6); 齊人來歸鄆 讙 龜陰田 (Zuo 11.10); c mod: 夫言死人為歸人，則生人 為行人矣 (Lie 1).
Definitions: 1‘return’,aitr:行而不 知歸，失家者也 (Lie 1); 取國子以歸於 吳 (Mo 49); b caus: 不如歸尸以內攻之 (Lü 15.6); 齊人來歸鄆 讙 龜陰田 (Zuo 11.10); c mod: 夫言死人為歸人，則生人 為行人矣 (Lie 1).

Full Entry: 歸 guī, *kwəi, vn, 1 ‘turn to, go to; give allegiance to’, a itr: 逃墨必歸於楊，逃楊 必歸於儒 (Meng 7B26); b tr: 天下歸湯 若流水 (Guan 80); 從之者如歸巿 (Meng 1B15); 是無歸夫 (SY 5); 2 nc, ‘refuge; home’: 夫上之所為，民之歸也(Zuo 10.21); 男有分，女有歸 (Li 9).
Definitions: 1 ‘turn to, go to; give allegiance to’, a itr: 逃墨必歸於楊，逃楊 必歸於儒 (Meng 7B26); b tr: 天下歸湯 若流水(Guan 80); 從之者如歸巿 (Meng 1B15); 是無歸夫 (SY 5); 2 nc, ‘refuge; home’: 夫上之所為，民之歸也 (Zuo 10.21); 男有分，女有歸 (Li 9).

Full Entry: 歸 guī, *kwəi, vn, 1 ‘give, consign, assign (to)’, a tr: 天下之民歸心焉 (LY 20.1); 天下歸仁焉 (LY 12.1); 然而天下獨 歸咎於齊者，何也 (ZGC 12.1); b tr2: 百 姓歸之名 (Li 27); c pseudo-tr2: 少取以成 秋，其余以歸之冬 (CQFL 49).
Definitions: 1 ‘give, consign, assign (to)’, a tr: 天下之民歸心焉 (LY 20.1); 天下歸仁焉 (LY 12.1); 然而天下獨 歸咎於齊者，何也 (ZGC 12.1); b tr2: 百 姓歸之名 (Li 27); c pseudo-tr2: 少取以成 秋，其余以歸之冬 (CQFL 49).

Full Entry: 室 shì, *lhit, nc, ‘chamber, room; house (building)’: 仲子所居之室，伯夷之所 築與 (Meng 3B10); ‘house, family’: 故視 人之室若其室，誰竊 (Mo 14); 夫妻不 和，家室大凶(SY 10.7); esp. the royal house: 為文王卿士，勳在王室(Zuo 5.5); 孔子西藏書於周室 (Zhuang 13); cf. note at 家[40.7]. Note: 室 is the most general word for a room in a house or the house itself; 寢 [40.11] specifically means a bedroom; 堂 [32.8] were ceremonial halls for rulers, built on an elevated platform; 庭 [53.7] is a more general word for a hall and the courtyard in its front.
Definitions: ‘chamber, room; house (building)’: 仲子所居之室，伯夷之所 築與 (Meng 3B10); ‘house, family’: 故視 人之室若其室，誰竊 (Mo 14); 夫妻不 和，家室大凶 (SY 10.7); esp. the royal house: 為文王卿士，勳在王室 (Zuo 5.5); 孔子西藏書於周室 (Zhuang 13); cf. note at 家 [40.7]. Note: 室 is the most general word for a room in a house or the house itself; 寢 [40.11] specifically means a bedroom; 堂 [32.8] were ceremonial halls for rulers, built on an elevated platform; 庭 [53.7] is a more general word for a hall and the courtyard in its front.

Full Entry: 築 zhú, *truk, vn, ‘build, construct’, tr: 仲子所居之室，伯夷之所築與 (Meng 3B10).
Definitions: ‘build, construct’, tr: 仲子所居之室，伯夷之所築與(Meng 3B10).

Full Entry: 狼 láng,*râŋ,nc,‘wolf’:吾國...虎狼之 所棲也 (Guan 80).
Definitions: ‘wolf’:吾國...虎狼之 所棲也 (Guan 80).

Full Entry: 棲 qī/xī, *sî, vi, ‘roost, dwell’: a itr: 越王 句踐乃以兵五千人棲於會稽山上 (SY 9); b caus: 吳王東伐越，棲諸會稽(Mo 49); 於是舉兵而攻齊，棲閔王於 莒 (SY 8).
Definitions: ‘roost, dwell’: a itr: 越王 句踐乃以兵五千人棲於會稽山上 (SY 9); b caus: 吳王東伐越，棲諸會稽 (Mo 49); 於是舉兵而攻齊，棲閔王於 莒 (SY 8).

Full Entry: 博 bó,*pâk,vi,1‘bebroad’,aitr:夫殺之 人，為利人也博矣(Mo 19); b caus: 博 我以文，約我以禮 (LY 9.11); ant. 淺[85.8]; 2 adv: 君子博學於文 (LY 6.27).
Definitions: 1‘bebroad’,aitr:夫殺之 人，為利人也博矣 (Mo 19); b caus: 博 我以文，約我以禮 (LY 9.11); ant. 淺 [85.8]; 2 adv: 君子博學於文 (LY 6.27).

Full Entry: 久 jiǔ, *kwəʔ, vi, ‘last a long time’: 久，彌異時也 (Mo 40); a itr: 天下之無 道也久矣 (LY 3.24); 久矣，吾不復夢見周公 (LY 7.5); esp. ‘stay a long time’: 久於 齊，非我志也(Meng 2B14); b caus: 久 師則兵敝矣 (SJ 69).
Definitions: ‘last a long time’: 久，彌異時也 (Mo 40); a itr: 天下之無道也久矣 (LY 3.24); 久矣，吾不復夢見 周公 (LY 7.5); esp. ‘stay a long time’: 久於 齊，非我志也 (Meng 2B14); b caus: 久 師則兵敝矣 (SJ 69).

Full Entry: 窮 qióng, *guŋ, vi, ‘be exhausted, destitute, depleted, wanting (for)’, a itr: 讒人 困窮 (Lü 3.4); 孔子窮於陳蔡之間，七日不火食 (Zhuang 20); 故君不窮於智 (HFei 5); b caus, ‘exhaust’: 舜不窮其 民，造父不窮其馬 (Xun 31); ‘reach the end (of)’: 故聖人之事，廣之則極宇 宙，窮日月(Lü 17.8); c mod: 昔上世之 窮民，貪於飲食，惰於從事(Mo 35). Syn. 貧 [154.4], 乏 [4.4]; ant. 達 [162.9].
Definitions: ‘be exhausted, destitute, depleted, wanting (for)’, a itr: 讒人 困窮 (Lü 3.4); 孔子窮於陳蔡之間，七日不火食(Zhuang 20); 故君不窮於智 (HFei 5); b caus, ‘exhaust’: 舜不窮其 民，造父不窮其馬 (Xun 31); ‘reach the end (of)’: 故聖人之事，廣之則極宇 宙，窮日月 (Lü 17.8); c mod: 昔上世之 窮民，貪於飲食，惰於從事 (Mo 35). Syn. 貧 [154.4], 乏 [4.4]; ant. 達 [162.9].

Full Entry: 烏 wū, *ʔâ, nc, ‘crow, raven’: 鵠不日浴 而白，烏不日黔而黑 (Zhuang 14).
Definitions: ‘crow, raven’: 鵠不日浴 而白，烏不日黔而黑 (Zhuang 14).

Full Entry: 皇帝 huángdì,*gwâŋ-têh,nc,‘emperor’, title created upon the founding of the empire in 221 bc: 秦王政立二十六 年，初并天下為三十六郡，號為始皇 帝 (SJ 5). Cf. Box 15.
Definitions: ‘emperor’, title created upon the founding of the empire in 221 bc: 秦王政立二十六 年，初并天下為三十六郡，號為始皇 帝 (SJ 5). Cf. Box 15.

Full Entry: 驕 jiāo,*kau,vst,‘behaughty,arrogant’, a itr: 君子泰而不驕，小人驕而不泰 (LY 13.26); 驕而不亡者，未之有也 (Zuo 11.13); 民固驕於愛，聽於威矣 (HFei 49); b comp: 齊桓公益驕，不務 德而務遠略 (SJ 39); c pseudo-tr: 驕其妻 妾(Meng 4B33); 志意修則驕富貴 (Xun 2); 予虛爵而驕之(Guan 35); d mod: 驕 君使疲民，則國危 (Guan 8). Syn. 傲[9.11].
Definitions: ‘behaughty,arrogant’, a itr: 君子泰而不驕，小人驕而不泰 (LY 13.26); 驕而不亡者，未之有也 (Zuo 11.13); 民固驕於愛，聽於威矣 (HFei 49); b comp: 齊桓公益驕，不務 德而務遠略 (SJ 39); c pseudo-tr: 驕其妻 妾 (Meng 4B33); 志意修則驕富貴 (Xun 2); 予虛爵而驕之 (Guan 35); d mod: 驕 君使疲民，則國危 (Guan 8). Syn. 傲[9.11].

Full Entry: 鮮 xiaň ,*senʔ,vi,1‘berare,scarce,few’, a itr: 富而不驕者，鮮 (Zuo 11.13); 巧言 令色，鮮矣仁 (LY 1.3); b caus, ‘reduce’: 作重幣以絕民資，又鑄大鍾以鮮其繼 (GY 3.6); ‘have few’: 君之所得山戎之寶 器者，中國之所鮮也 (SY 13); 2 adv, ‘rarely’: 不度之人，鮮不為患 (Zuo 9.31).
Definitions: 1‘berare,scarce,few’, a itr: 富而不驕者，鮮 (Zuo 11.13); 巧言 令色，鮮矣仁 (LY 1.3); b caus, ‘reduce’: 作重幣以絕民資，又鑄大鍾以鮮其繼 (GY 3.6); ‘have few’: 君之所得山戎之寶 器者，中國之所鮮也 (SY 13); 2 adv, ‘rarely’: 不度之人，鮮不為患 (Zuo 9.31).

Full Entry: 羞 xiū, *snu, vn, ‘be ashamed (of)’ tr: 柳下惠不羞汙君，不卑小官 (Meng 2A9); 是仁人之所羞而不為也 (Xun 16).
Definitions: ‘be ashamed (of)’ tr: 柳下惠不羞汙君，不卑小官 (Meng 2A9); 是仁人之所羞而不為也 (Xun 16).

Full Entry: 楮 chǔ, *thraʔ/tâʔ, nc, ‘mulberry tree’: 宋人有為其君以象為楮葉者 (HFei 21).
Definitions: ‘mulberry tree’: 宋人有為其君以象為楮葉者 (HFei 21).

Full Entry: 葉 yè, *lap/lep, nc, ‘leaf (of a tree)’: 宋 人有為其君以象為楮葉者 (HFei 21).
Definitions: ‘leaf (of a tree)’: 宋 人有為其君以象為楮葉者 (HFei 21).

Full Entry: 美 měi, *muiʔ, vst, 1 ‘be beautiful, fine, excellent’, a itr: 牛山之木嘗美矣 (Meng 6A8); b caus: 君子之學也，以美其身 (Xun 1); 美其服，安其居 (Lao 80); c mod: 所愛美女欲以其子為後 (HFei 31); 2 nc, ‘beauty’: 天下皆知美之為美 (Lao 2). Ant. 惡 [61.8].
Definitions: 1 ‘be beautiful, fine, excellent’, a itr: 牛山之木嘗美矣(Meng 6A8); b caus: 君子之學也，以美其身 (Xun 1); 美其服，安其居 (Lao 80); c mod: 所愛美女欲以其子為後(HFei 31); 2 nc, ‘beauty’: 天下皆知美之為美 (Lao 2). Ant. 惡 [61.8].

Full Entry: 棄 qì, *khits, vtr, ‘abandon, discard, reject, throw away’, a tr: 棄君之命，不信 (Zuo 7.2); b pass: 水官棄矣， 故龍不生 得 (Zuo 10.29); c mod: 人無棄人，物無 棄物 (HNan 12); 問國之棄人， 何族之 子弟也 (Guan 24).
Definitions: ‘abandon, discard, reject, throw away’, a tr: 棄君之命，不信 (Zuo 7.2); b pass: 水官棄矣， 故龍不生 得(Zuo 10.29); c mod: 人無棄人，物無 棄物 (HNan 12); 問國之棄人， 何族之 子弟也 (Guan 24).

Full Entry: 擇 zé, *drak, vn, ‘choose, select’, a tr: 鳥 則擇木 (Zuo 12.11); b itr: 君請擇於斯二 者 (Meng 1B15).
Definitions: ‘choose, select’, a tr: 鳥 則擇木 (Zuo 12.11); b itr: 君請擇於斯二 者 (Meng 1B15).

Full Entry: 悌/弟 tì,*dîh,nc,1‘fraternallove’:孝 弟也者，其為仁之本與(LY 1.2); 不恭 祖舊則孝悌不備 (Guan 1); 弟敬愛兄謂 之悌，反悌為敖 (XS 8.3); 2 vst,‘show fraternal love’, a itr: 入則孝，出則悌 (Meng 3B4); 為人弟必悌 (Mo 16); b caus: 父不得子其子，兄不得弟其弟 (Guan 80).
Definitions: 1‘fraternallove’:孝 弟也者，其為仁之本與 (LY 1.2); 不恭祖舊則孝悌不備 (Guan 1); 弟敬愛兄謂 之悌，反悌為敖(XS 8.3); 2 vst,‘show fraternal love’, a itr: 入則孝，出則悌 (Meng 3B4); 為人弟必悌 (Mo 16); b caus: 父不得子其子，兄不得弟其弟 (Guan 80).

Full Entry: 恆 héng, *gəŋ̂ , vi, 1 ‘be constant, regular’: a itr: 其不言有，不使麟不恆於中 國也 (GLiang 12.14); b caus: 而欲恆其 生，盡其終，惑於數也 (Lie 1); c mod: 有恆產者有恆心，無恆產者無恆心 (Meng 3A3); 夏，恆星不見，夜明也(Zuo 3.7); 2 adv: 愛人者人恆愛之，敬 人者人恆敬之(Meng 4B28).
Definitions: 1 ‘be constant, regular’: a itr: 其不言有，不使麟不恆於中 國也 (GLiang 12.14); b caus: 而欲恆其 生，盡其終，惑於數也 (Lie 1); c mod: 有恆產者有恆心，無恆產者無恆心 (Meng 3A3); 夏，恆星不見，夜明也 (Zuo 3.7); 2 adv: 愛人者人恆愛之，敬 人者人恆敬之 (Meng 4B28).

Full Entry: 飢 jī,*kri,vi,‘starve,behungry’,aitr:黎 民不飢不寒 (Meng 1A3); b caus: 飢之渴 之，馳之驟之，整之齊之 (Zhuang 9); c mod: 國無飢民 (Guan 83).
Definitions: ‘starve,behungry’,aitr:黎 民不飢不寒 (Meng 1A3); b caus: 飢之渴 之，馳之驟之，整之齊之 (Zhuang 9); c mod: 國無飢民 (Guan 83).

Full Entry: 寒 hán, *gân, vst, 1 ‘be cold’, a itr: 脣亡 齒寒 (Zuo 5.5); b caus: 一日暴之，十日 寒之 (Meng 6A9); c comp: 冰，水為 之，而寒於水 (Xun 1); d mod: 寒水之所 積也 (HNan 4); 2 nc, ‘cold’: 馬，蹄可以 踐霜雪，毛可以禦風寒 (Zhuang 9); 日 月運行，一寒一暑 (Yi 7). Ant. 暑 [72.8].
Definitions: 1 ‘be cold’, a itr: 脣亡 齒寒 (Zuo 5.5); b caus: 一日暴之，十日 寒之 (Meng 6A9); c comp: 冰，水為 之，而寒於水 (Xun 1); d mod: 寒水之所 積也 (HNan 4); 2 nc, ‘cold’: 馬，蹄可以 踐霜雪，毛可以禦風寒 (Zhuang 9); 日 月運行，一寒一暑 (Yi 7). Ant. 暑 [72.8].

Full Entry: 資 zī, *tsi vn, ‘furnish, provide (with)’, a tr: 今逐客以資敵國 (SJ 87); b tr2: 陰行謀 臣，資之金玉 (SJ 87); 資之金玉寶器 (ZGC 15.5); c tr with PrP: 鎮之以辭 令，資之以幣帛(HFei 44); 堯何以資汝 (Zhuang 18).
Definitions: ‘furnish, provide (with)’, a tr: 今逐客以資敵國 (SJ 87); b tr2: 陰行謀 臣，資之金玉 (SJ 87); 資之金玉寶器 (ZGC 15.5); c tr with PrP: 鎮之以辭 令，資之以幣帛 (HFei 44); 堯何以資汝 (Zhuang 18).

Full Entry: 帛 bó, *brâk, nc, ‘silk’: 子女玉帛，則君 有之 (Zuo 5.23); 五十者可以衣帛矣 (Meng 1A3); 書之竹帛，琢之槃盂，傳以遺後世子孫 (Mo 10).
Definitions: ‘silk’: 子女玉帛，則君 有之 (Zuo 5.23); 五十者可以衣帛矣 (Meng 1A3); 書之竹帛，琢之槃盂，傳 以遺後世子孫(Mo 10).

Full Entry: 雖 suī, *swi, conj, 1 ‘although, even if, even though’: 國一日被攻，雖欲事 秦，不可得也 (ZGC 8.17); cf. 16.2; 2 ptemp, ‘even’: 雖小道，必有可觀者焉 (LY 19.4); 雖我亦將非之 (Mo 16).
Definitions: 1 ‘although, even if, even though’: 國一日被攻，雖欲事秦，不可得也 (ZGC 8.17); cf. 16.2; 2 ptemp, ‘even’: 雖小道，必有可觀者焉 (LY 19.4); 雖我亦將非之 (Mo 16).

Full Entry: 雖然 suīrán, *swi–nan, conj, ‘nevertheless’: 雖然，未聞道也 (Meng 3A2).
Definitions: ‘nevertheless’: 雖然，未聞道也 (Meng 3A2).
BS_Gloss: although; even if / so, thus; (adv suffix)

Full Entry: 存 cún, *dzən̂ , vi, a itr, ‘exist, be there, survive’: 父母俱存 (Meng 7A20); b caus, ‘keep, retain’: 存其心，養其性，所以事 天也 (Meng 7A1). Ant. 亡 [8.1], 去 [28.3].
Definitions: a itr, ‘exist, be there, survive’: 父母俱存 (Meng 7A20); b caus, ‘keep, retain’: 存其心，養其性，所以事 天也(Meng 7A1). Ant. 亡 [8.1], 去 [28.3].

Full Entry: 變 biàn,*prons,vtr,‘change,alter,modify’, a tr: 今吾欲變法以治 (SJS 1); b pass: 未聞 變於夷者也 (Meng 3A4); 雖體解吾猶未 變兮 (ChuC 1); 師長教之弗為變 (HFei 49); c mod: 遭變事而不知其權 (SJ 130).
Definitions: ‘change,alter,modify’, a tr: 今吾欲變法以治 (SJS 1); b pass: 未聞 變於夷者也 (Meng 3A4); 雖體解吾猶未 變兮(ChuC 1); 師長教之弗為變 (HFei 49); c mod: 遭變事而不知其權 (SJ 130).

Full Entry: 隨 suí,*s-wai,vn,‘follow,goalongwith’, a itr: 主倡而臣和，主先而臣隨 (SJ 130); b tr: 吾為子先行，子隨我後 (ZGC 14.3); 國人爭隨之 (SJ 99). Cf. 遂 [162.9].
Definitions: ‘follow,goalongwith’, a itr: 主倡而臣和，主先而臣隨 (SJ 130); b tr: 吾為子先行，子隨我後 (ZGC 14.3); 國人爭隨之 (SJ 99). Cf. 遂 [162.9].

Full Entry: 隨 Suí, *s-wai, np, a polity: 漢東之 國，隨為大 (Zuo 2.6). Note: Sui was a small polity in the region of modern Hubei. Allotted to members of the royal Ji 姬 clan in Western Zhou times, it became a dependent of Chu 楚in late Chunqiu times.
Definitions: a polity: 漢東之 國，隨為大 (Zuo 2.6). Note: Sui was a small polity in the region of modern Hubei. Allotted to members of the royal Ji 姬 clan in Western Zhou times, it became a dependent of Chu 楚 in late Chunqiu times.

Full Entry: 蹄 tí, *dê, nc, ‘hoof ’: 馬，蹄可以踐霜 雪，毛可以禦風寒(Zhuang 9).
Definitions: ‘hoof ’: 馬，蹄可以踐霜 雪，毛可以禦風寒 (Zhuang 9).

Full Entry: 踐 jiàn, *dzanʔ, vn, ‘step, tread on’, a tr: 馬，蹄可以踐霜雪，毛可以禦風寒 (Zhuang 9); b itr: 擇土而踐，位平然後處 (SY 18). Syn. 履[44.12].
Definitions: ‘step, tread on’, a tr: 馬，蹄可以踐霜雪，毛可以禦風寒(Zhuang 9); b itr: 擇土而踐，位平然後 處 (SY 18). Syn. 履[44.12].

Full Entry: 霜 shuāng, *sraŋ, nc, ‘frost’: 霜露所隊 (Li 31); 馬，蹄可以踐霜雪，毛可以禦 風寒 (Zhuang 9).
Definitions: ‘frost’: 霜露所隊 (Li 31); 馬，蹄可以踐霜雪，毛可以禦風寒 (Zhuang 9).

Full Entry: 雪 xuě, *sot, nc, ‘snow’: 馬，蹄可以踐 霜雪，毛可以禦風寒 (Zhuang 9).
Definitions: ‘snow’: 馬，蹄可以踐 霜雪，毛可以禦風寒 (Zhuang 9).

Full Entry: 毛 máo, *mâu, nc, ‘hair, fur’: 馬，蹄可 以踐霜雪，毛可以禦風寒 (Zhuang 9); 人之所以為人者，非特以二足而無毛 也(Xun 5).
Definitions: ‘hair, fur’: 馬，蹄可 以踐霜雪，毛可以禦風寒 (Zhuang 9); 人之所以為人者，非特以二足而無毛 也 (Xun 5).

Full Entry: 禦 yù, *ŋaʔ, vn, ‘fend off, resist, withstand; ward off, repel’, tr: 馬，蹄可以踐 霜雪，毛可以禦風寒 (Zhuang 9).
Definitions: ‘fend off, resist, withstand; ward off, repel’, tr: 馬，蹄可以踐 霜雪，毛可以禦風寒 (Zhuang 9).

Full Entry: 風 fēng, *pəm, nc, 1 ‘wind’: 草上之 風，必偃 (LY 12.19); 2 vn, ‘expose oneself to the wind’, itr: 不可以風 (Meng 2B2).
Definitions: 1 ‘wind’: 草上之 風，必偃 (LY 12.19); 2 vn, ‘expose oneself to the wind’, itr: 不可以風 (Meng 2B2).

Full Entry: 別 bié, *prat, vn, 1 ‘separate, differentiate, divide’, only tr: 夫禮者所以...別同 異，明是非也 (Li 1); 別物上下 (Mo 19); 故聖人聞其聲則別其清濁 (CQFL 20). Ant. 兼 [12.8].
Definitions: 1 ‘separate, differentiate, divide’, only tr: 夫禮者所以...別同 異，明是非也 (Li 1); 別物上下 (Mo 19); 故聖人聞其聲則別其清濁 (CQFL 20). Ant. 兼 [12.8].

Full Entry: 別 bié, *brat, vi [< preceding], 1 ‘be separated, different’, a itr: 不敬，何以別乎 (LY 2.7); 水別於他水(Guan 57); 男女行 者別於塗 (SJ 47); b mod: 唯天子之 喪，有別姓而哭 (Li 3); ant. 兼 [12.8]; 2 nc, ‘separation, division; difference’: 父子 有親，君臣有義，夫婦有別，長幼有 序，朋友有信 (Meng 3A4); 此可謂知義 與不義之別乎(Mo 17).
Definitions: 1 ‘be separated, different’, a itr: 不敬，何以別乎 (LY 2.7); 水別於他水 (Guan 57); 男女行 者別於塗 (SJ 47); b mod: 唯天子之 喪，有別姓而哭 (Li 3); ant. 兼 [12.8]; 2 nc, ‘separation, division; difference’: 父子 有親，君臣有義，夫婦有別，長幼有 序，朋友有信 (Meng 3A4); 此可謂知義 與不義之別乎 (Mo 17).

Full Entry: 勞 lào, *râuh, vn, ‘reward, recompense’, a tr: 勞農勸民(Lü 4.1); 周公拂其首，勞 而食之 (SY 3.6); b itr: 上卿逆於境，晉 侯郊勞 (GY 1.14).
Definitions: ‘reward, recompense’, a tr: 勞農勸民 (Lü 4.1); 周公拂其首，勞 而食之 (SY 3.6); b itr: 上卿逆於境，晉 侯郊勞(GY 1.14).

Full Entry: 勞 láo, *râu, vi, ‘toil, labour, work (to exhaustion)’, a itr: 飢者弗食，勞者弗息 (Meng 1B11); 勞而欲休，此人之情性也 (Xun 23); b caus: 君子信而後勞其民 (LY 19.10); 或勞心，或勞力，勞心者治 人，勞力者治於人 (Meng 3A4). Ant. 息 [61.6], 佚 [9.5].
Definitions: ‘toil, labour, work (to exhaustion)’, a itr: 飢者弗食，勞者弗息 (Meng 1B11); 勞而欲休，此人之情性也 (Xun 23); b caus: 君子信而後勞其民 (LY 19.10); 或勞心，或勞力，勞心者治 人，勞力者治於人 (Meng 3A4). Ant. 息 [61.6], 佚 [9.5].

Full Entry: 息 xí, *sək, vi, 1 ‘rest, take a break’, a itr: 楊墨之道不息，孔子之道不著 (Meng 3B9); b caus,‘let rest’: 飢者弗食，勞者弗 息 (Meng 1B11); ant. 勞 [19.10]; 2 ‘exhale’, itr: 喟然太息 (Lü 21.3).
Definitions: 1 ‘rest, take a break’, a itr: 楊墨之道不息，孔子之道不著 (Meng 3B9); b caus,‘let rest’: 飢者弗食，勞者弗 息(Meng 1B11); ant. 勞 [19.10]; 2 ‘exhale’, itr: 喟然太息(Lü 21.3).

Full Entry: 慮 lǜ, *rah, vn, 1 ‘ponder, consider, think (about)’, a itr: 安而後能慮，慮而 後能得 (Li 42); b tr: 使知者慮之，則與愚者論之 (Xun 12); 2 nc, ‘thoughts, deliberation’: 君亟定變法之慮 (SJS 1). Syn. 思 [61.5].
Definitions: 1 ‘ponder, consider, think (about)’, a itr: 安而後能慮，慮而 後能得 (Li 42); b tr: 使知者慮之，則與 愚者論之(Xun 12); 2 nc, ‘thoughts, deliberation’: 君亟定變法之慮(SJS 1). Syn. 思 [61.5].

Full Entry: 乘 chéng, *m-ləŋ, vn, ‘mount, ascend; ride’, a tr: 雖有舟輿，無所乘之 (Lao 80); b itr: 故魚乘於水，鳥乘於風，草木乘於時 (SY 3).
Definitions: ‘mount, ascend; ride’, a tr: 雖有舟輿，無所乘之 (Lao 80); b itr: 故魚乘於水，鳥乘於風，草 木乘於時 (SY 3).

Full Entry: 乘 shèng, *m-ləŋh, nc [< preceding], ‘chariot’: 萬乘之國，弒其君者，必千 乘之家 (Meng 1A1).
Definitions: ‘chariot’: 萬乘之國，弒其君者，必千 乘之家 (Meng 1A1).

Full Entry: 吠 fèi, *ba(t)s, vn, ‘bark’, a itr: 衣狗裘者 當犬吠 (SY 11); 犬吠不驚，命曰金城 (SY 16); b tr: 其狗不知而吠之 (HFei 23); c mod (!): 北海則有走馬吠犬焉 (Xun 9). Cf. note at 鳴[196.3].
Definitions: ‘bark’, a itr: 衣狗裘者 當犬吠 (SY 11); 犬吠不驚，命曰金城 (SY 16); b tr: 其狗不知而吠之 (HFei 23); c mod (!): 北海則有走馬吠犬焉 (Xun 9). Cf. note at 鳴 [196.3].

Full Entry: 及 jí, *gəp, vn, 1, ‘arrive (at), reach’, a tr: 軍且及之，棄其所抱 (LNZ 5.6); b itr: 田氏弗先，禍及矣 (SJ 46); 2 prep, ‘upon, at (a time)’: 及其長也，無不知敬 其兄也 (Meng 7A15); 3 conj, a temporal, ‘when, as soon as’: 及至文武，各當時而 立法，因事而制禮 (SJS 1); cf. 16.3; syn. 比[81.0], 至 [133.0]; b coordinating, ‘as well as, and’: 生莊公及共叔段 (Zuo 1.1). Note: As a coordinating conj, 及 is an older, more formal synonym of 與 [134.7]; it mainly coordinates names, often implying that the second is less important than the first.
Definitions: 1, ‘arrive (at), reach’, a tr: 軍且及之，棄其所抱 (LNZ 5.6); b itr: 田氏弗先，禍及矣 (SJ 46); 2 prep, ‘upon, at (a time)’: 及其長也，無不知敬 其兄也 (Meng 7A15); 3 conj, a temporal, ‘when, as soon as’: 及至文武，各當時而 立法，因事而制禮 (SJS 1); cf. 16.3; syn. 比 [81.0], 至 [133.0]; b coordinating, ‘as well as, and’: 生莊公及共叔段 (Zuo 1.1). Note: As a coordinating conj, 及 is an older, more formal synonym of 與 [134.7]; it mainly coordinates names, often implying that the second is less important than the first.

Full Entry: 盟 méng, *mraŋ, nc, ‘covenant, oath (of alliance)’: 藏於盟府 (Zuo 5.5).
Definitions: ‘covenant, oath (of alliance)’: 藏於盟府 (Zuo 5.5).

Full Entry: 宰 zǎi, *tsəʔ̂ , nc, ‘superintendent’: 宰者 何，官也(GYang 1.1); 原思為之宰 (LY 6.5).
Definitions: ‘superintendent’: 宰者 何，官也 (GYang 1.1); 原思為之宰 (LY 6.5).

Full Entry: 宰夫 zǎifū, *tsəʔ̂ -pa, nc, ‘assistant minister; chef, cook’: 宰夫胹熊蹯不熟 (Zuo 7.2).
Definitions: ‘assistant minister; chef, cook’: 宰夫胹熊蹯不熟 (Zuo 7.2).

Full Entry: 且 qiě, *tshaʔ, conj, 1 ‘and, moreover’, a coordinating VP: 不義而富且貴 (LY 7.16); 孔子貧且賤 (SJ 47); b coordinating clauses: 事不可必也，且政在焉 (Zuo 10.25); cf. 15.2; syn. 又 [29.0], 亦 [8.4]; cf. 而 [126.0]; 2 adv, ‘be about to’: 我且賢之 用，能之使 (HFei 33); syn. 將[41.8].
Definitions: 1 ‘and, moreover’, a coordinating VP: 不義而富且貴 (LY 7.16); 孔子貧且賤 (SJ 47); b coordinating clauses: 事不可必也，且政在焉 (Zuo 10.25); cf. 15.2; syn. 又 [29.0], 亦 [8.4]; cf. 而 [126.0]; 2 adv, ‘be about to’: 我且賢之用，能之使 (HFei 33); syn. 將 [41.8].

Full Entry: 舍 shě, *lhaʔ, vn, ‘put to rest, let go, discard, reject, leave behind, put aside’, a tr: 食舍肉 (Zuo 1.1); 舍其舊而新是謀 (Zuo 5.28); 以為無益而舍之者，不耘苗者也 (Meng 2A2); b itr: 操則存，舍則亡 (Meng 6A8). Ant. 取 [29.6].
Definitions: ‘put to rest, let go, discard, reject, leave behind, put aside’, a tr: 食舍肉 (Zuo 1.1); 舍其舊而新是謀 (Zuo 5.28); 以為無益而舍之者，不耘苗者也 (Meng 2A2); b itr: 操則存，舍則亡 (Meng 6A8). Ant. 取 [29.6].

Full Entry: 舍 shè, *lhah, vn, 1 ‘rest’, a itr: 原泉混 混，不舍晝夜(Meng 4B18); esp. ‘lodge, spend the night’: 初，宣子田於首 山，舍于翳桑 (Zuo 7.2); b tr: 商君亡至 關下，欲舍客舍 (SJ 68); 2 nc, ‘lodging place’: 欲舍客舍 (SJ 68).
Definitions: 1 ‘rest’, a itr: 原泉混 混，不舍晝夜 (Meng 4B18); esp. ‘lodge, spend the night’: 初，宣子田於首 山，舍于翳桑(Zuo 7.2); b tr: 商君亡至 關下，欲舍客舍 (SJ 68); 2 nc, ‘lodging place’: 欲舍客舍 (SJ 68).

Full Entry: 謀 móu, *mə, vn, 1 ‘plan; plot/scheme (against)’, a itr: 為人謀而不忠乎 (LY 1.4); b tr: 彼則懼而協以謀我 (Zuo 2.6); 舍其 舊而新是謀 (Zuo 5.28); 2 nc, ‘plan; plot’, a head: 其舉果，其謀和 (SY 8); b mod: 謀 士盡其謀，百工盡其巧(Guan 76).
Definitions: 1 ‘plan; plot/scheme (against)’, a itr: 為人謀而不忠乎(LY 1.4); b tr: 彼則懼而協以謀我 (Zuo 2.6); 舍其 舊而新是謀 (Zuo 5.28); 2 nc, ‘plan; plot’, a head: 其舉果，其謀和 (SY 8); b mod: 謀 士盡其謀，百工盡其巧 (Guan 76).

Full Entry: 依 yī, *ʔəi, vn, ‘rely on, lean on’, a itr: 依 於庭牆而哭 (Zuo 11.4); b tr: 輔車相 依，唇亡齒寒 (Zuo 5.5); 鬼神非人實親，惟德是依 (Zuo 5.5).
Definitions: ‘rely on, lean on’, a itr: 依 於庭牆而哭 (Zuo 11.4); b tr: 輔車相 依，唇亡齒寒 (Zuo 5.5); 鬼神非人實 親，惟德是依 (Zuo 5.5).

Full Entry: 慟 tòng, *dôŋh, vi, ‘be moved (to tears), lament, grieve’, only itr: 子慟矣 . . . 非夫人之為慟而誰為 (LY 11.10); 悲心感慟 (LNZ 1.7). Cf. 動 [19.9].
Definitions: ‘be moved (to tears), lament, grieve’, only itr: 子慟矣 . . . 非夫人之為慟而誰為 (LY 11.10); 悲心感慟 (LNZ 1.7). Cf. 動 [19.9].

Full Entry: 哉 zāi, *tsə,̂ ptemp, a with verbal P: 為仁 由己，而由人乎哉 (LY 12.1); b ofen with inverted P: 久矣哉，由之行詐也(LY 9.12); 君子哉商子也 (SY 3.6); c with nom P: 是豈水之性哉 (Meng 6A2); cf. 14.3 and Review 4.
Definitions: a with verbal P: 為仁 由己，而由人乎哉 (LY 12.1); b ofen with inverted P: 久矣哉，由之行詐也 (LY 9.12); 君子哉商子也 (SY 3.6); c with nom P: 是豈水之性哉(Meng 6A2); cf. 14.3 and Review 4.

Full Entry: 奚 xī,*gê,print,1‘what?’,aasO:子將奚先 (LY 13.3); b with prep: 雖多，亦奚以為 (LY 13.5); 奚由相得 (Lü 16.3); 君長有齊，奚以 薛為 (HFei 23); 2 adv, ‘why?, how?’: 子奚不為政 (LY 2.21); 夫奚說書其不義以遺後 世哉 (Mo 17). Syn. 何 [9.5], 胡 [130.5].
Definitions: 1‘what?’,aasO:子將奚先 (LY 13.3); b with prep: 雖多，亦奚以為 (LY 13.5); 奚由相得 (Lü 16.3); 君長有齊，奚以薛為 (HFei 23); 2 adv, ‘why?, how?’: 子奚不 為政 (LY 2.21); 夫奚說書其不義以遺後 世哉 (Mo 17). Syn. 何[9.5], 胡 [130.5].

Full Entry: 巍巍 wéiwéi,*ŋui-ŋui,vst,1‘be towering, lofty; majestic, magnificent’, itr: 巍巍 乎，其有成功也 (LY 8.19); 高皇帝受命 平暴亂，功德巍巍 (YTL 52); 2 adv: 泰 山之容，巍巍然高 (HNZ 16).
Definitions: 1‘be towering, lofty; majestic, magnificent’, itr: 巍巍乎，其有成功也 (LY 8.19); 高皇帝受命 平暴亂，功德巍巍 (YTL 52); 2 adv: 泰 山之容，巍巍然高 (HNZ 16).

Full Entry: 討 tǎo, *thûʔ, vn, ‘investigate; hold accountable, punish’, a tr: 慮世事之 變，討正法之本 (SJS 1); 子為正卿，亡 不越竟，反不討賊，非子而誰 (Zuo 7.2); b itr: 己則無禮，而討於有禮者 (Zuo 6.15).
Definitions: ‘investigate; hold accountable, punish’, a tr: 慮世事之變，討正法之本 (SJS 1); 子為正卿，亡 不越竟，反不討賊，非子而誰 (Zuo 7.2); b itr: 己則無禮，而討於有禮者(Zuo 6.15).

Full Entry: 斯 sī, *se, prdem, 1 ‘this’, a head: 困而不 學，民斯為下矣(LY 16.9); b mod: 請事 斯語矣 (LY 12.2); cf. note at 此[77.2]; 2 conj, ‘then’: 我欲仁，斯仁至矣 (LY 7.30); 得其民，斯得天下矣 . . . 得其 心，斯得民矣 (Meng 4A10); 天下皆知 美之為美，斯惡已 (Lao 2); cf. 15.4.2.
Definitions: 1 ‘this’, a head: 困而不 學，民斯為下矣 (LY 16.9); b mod: 請事 斯語矣 (LY 12.2); cf. note at 此 [77.2]; 2 conj, ‘then’: 我欲仁，斯仁至矣 (LY 7.30); 得其民，斯得天下矣 . . . 得其 心，斯得民矣 (Meng 4A10); 天下皆知 美之為美，斯惡已 (Lao 2); cf. 15.4.2.

Full Entry: 勝 shēng, *lhəŋ, vn, 1 ‘succeed, be up to (a task)’; a tr: 王喜，以為能勝其任也 (Meng 1B9); b itr: 執圭，鞠躬如也，如不勝 (LY 10.4); 心暇者勝 (Lü 17.3); 2 adv,‘successfully, completely, fully’: 不違農時，穀不可勝食 也 (Meng 1A3); 夫天下之為聞見鬼神之 物者，不可勝計也 (Mo 31); cf. 24.3–24; 3 nc,‘success, victory’: 勝久則鈍兵挫銳 (Sun 2); 故能全其勝 (HNan 15).
Definitions: 1 ‘succeed, be up to (a task)’; a tr: 王喜，以為能勝其任也 (Meng 1B9); b itr: 執圭，鞠躬如也，如不勝 (LY 10.4); 心暇者勝 (Lü 17.3); 2 adv,‘successfully, completely, fully’: 不違農時，穀不可勝食 也 (Meng 1A3); 夫天下之為聞見鬼神之 物者，不可勝計也 (Mo 31); cf. 24.3–24; 3 nc,‘success, victory’: 勝久則鈍兵挫銳 (Sun 2); 故能全其勝 (HNan 15).

Full Entry: 勝 shèng, *lhəŋh, vn [< preceding], ‘exceed, defeat, overcome, prevail’, a tr: 人 民不勝禽獸蟲蛇 (HFei 49); 故欲勝人 者，必先自勝 (Lü 3.3); b itr: 王者之 兵，勝而不驕(SJS 10). Ant. 敗 [66.7], 負 [154.2].
Definitions: ‘exceed, defeat, overcome, prevail’, a tr: 人 民不勝禽獸蟲蛇 (HFei 49); 故欲勝人 者，必先自勝 (Lü 3.3); b itr: 王者之 兵，勝而不驕 (SJS 10). Ant. 敗 [66.7], 負 [154.2].

Full Entry: 夢 mèng, *məŋ, vn, ‘dream (of )’, 夢，臥 而以為然也 (Mo 40); a tr: 夜夢之 (Zuo 7.15); with infinitive O: 晉侯夢與楚子 搏 (Zuo 5.28); 不知周之夢為胡蝶與，胡 蝶之夢為周與(Zhuang 2); b itr: 方其夢 也，不知其夢也 (Zhuang 2).
Definitions: ‘dream (of )’, 夢，臥 而以為然也 (Mo 40); a tr: 夜夢之(Zuo 7.15); with infinitive O: 晉侯夢與楚子 搏 (Zuo 5.28); 不知周之夢為胡蝶與，胡 蝶之夢為周與 (Zhuang 2); b itr: 方其夢 也，不知其夢也 (Zhuang 2).

Full Entry: 嗚呼 wūhū, *ʔâ-hâ, interj, ‘alas!’: 宣 子曰，嗚呼 (Zuo 7.2).
Definitions: ‘alas!’: 宣 子曰，嗚呼 (Zuo 7.2).

Full Entry: 哀 āi,*ʔəî,nc,1‘sorrow’:不勝其哀，故 哭也 (SY 6); 2 vst, ‘be sorrowful, mournful’, a itr: 鳥之將死也其嗚也哀 (LY 8.4); b caus: 人主胡可以不務哀士 (Lü 15.4).
Definitions: 1‘sorrow’:不勝其哀，故 哭也 (SY 6); 2 vst, ‘be sorrowful, mournful’, a itr: 鳥之將死也其嗚也哀 (LY 8.4); b caus: 人主胡可以不務哀士 (Lü 15.4).

Full Entry: 全 quán,*dzon,vi,‘becomplete,whole, intact’, a itr: 子固非魚也，子之不知魚 之樂，全矣 (Zhuang 17); b caus: 善用兵 者持五殺以應，故能全其勝 (HNan 15); c mod: 全國為上，破國次之 (Sun 3).
Definitions: ‘becomplete,whole, intact’, a itr: 子固非魚也，子之不知魚 之樂，全矣 (Zhuang 17); b caus: 善用兵 者持五殺以應，故能全其勝 (HNan 15); c mod: 全國為上，破國次之 (Sun 3).

Full Entry: 險 xiǎn, *hŋramʔ, vst, ‘be steep, dangerous’, a itr: 彼其道遠而險，又有江山 (Zhuang 20); b caus: 脩其土田，險其走 集 (Zuo 10.23); c comp: 是姦人將以盜名 於晻世者也，險莫大焉 (Xun 3). Ant. 平 [51.2].
Definitions: ‘be steep, dangerous’, a itr: 彼其道遠而險，又有江山(Zhuang 20); b caus: 脩其土田，險其走 集 (Zuo 10.23); c comp: 是姦人將以盜名 於晻世者也，險莫大焉 (Xun 3). Ant. 平 [51.2].

Full Entry: 次 cì, *tshih, nc, [perhaps < 二], 1 ‘the second, next, following’: 學而知之者次 也，困而學之，又其次也 (LY 16.9); ‘sequence, order’: 抑晉國之舉也，不失 其次 (GY 2.11); ‘position’: 法有，民安其 次 (SJS 20); 2 vn, ‘follow, be next’, tr: 全卒 為上，破卒次之 (Sun 3). Syn. 序 [53.4]; cf. note at 二 [7.0].
Definitions: [perhaps < 二], 1 ‘the second, next, following’: 學而知之者次 也，困而學之，又其次也 (LY 16.9); ‘sequence, order’: 抑晉國之舉也，不失 其次 (GY 2.11); ‘position’: 法有，民安其 次 (SJS 20); 2 vn, ‘follow, be next’, tr: 全卒 為上，破卒次之 (Sun 3). Syn. 序 [53.4]; cf. note at 二[7.0].

Full Entry: 臭 chòu,*k-hjuh,nc,1‘smell,stench’:色 惡，不食，臭惡，不食 (LY 10.8); 2 vi, ‘be malodorous, smelly, stink’, a itr: 腥臊 惡臭而傷害腹胃 (HFei 49); 酤酒而 酸，買肉而臭(HNan 17); b mod: 廚中 有臭肉，則門下無死士矣 (SY 8). Ant. 香 [186.0].
Definitions: 1‘smell,stench’:色 惡，不食，臭惡，不食 (LY 10.8); 2 vi, ‘be malodorous, smelly, stink’, a itr: 腥臊 惡臭而傷害腹胃 (HFei 49); 酤酒而 酸，買肉而臭 (HNan 17); b mod: 廚中 有臭肉，則門下無死士矣 (SY 8). Ant. 香 [186.0].

Full Entry: 娶 qǔ,*tshoh,vn,‘marry,takeaswife’,a tr: 蒼梧之弟娶妻而美好 (SY 3.21); b itr: 舜不告而娶 (Meng 4A27); 椒舉娶于申公子牟 (Zuo 9.26). Cf. 嫁 [38.10]; 妻 [38.5].
Definitions: ‘marry,takeaswife’,a tr: 蒼梧之弟娶妻而美好 (SY 3.21); b itr: 舜不告而娶 (Meng 4A27); 椒舉娶于申 公子牟 (Zuo 9.26). Cf. 嫁 [38.10]; 妻 [38.5].

Full Entry: 黎民 límín, *rî-min, nc, ‘black (-haired) people’, i.e. the common people: 黎民不飢不寒 (Meng 1A3).
Definitions: ‘black (-haired) people’, i.e. the common people: 黎民不飢不寒 (Meng 1A3).

Full Entry: 黎 lí,*rî,vi,‘beblack’,aitr:手足胼胝，面 目黎黑(SJ 87); b mod: 黎民不飢不寒 (Meng 1A3). Syn. 黑 [203.0]; cf. 民[83.1].
Definitions: ‘beblack’,aitr:手足胼胝，面 目黎黑(SJ 87); b mod: 黎民不飢不寒 (Meng 1A3). Syn. 黑 [203.0]; cf. 民 [83.1].

Full Entry: 脣 chún, *m-dun, nc, ‘lips’: 脣亡齒寒 (Zuo 5.5).
Definitions: ‘lips’: 脣亡齒寒 (Zuo 5.5).

Full Entry: 貳 èr, *nis, vn, 1 ‘be double-minded (to), duplicitous; split loyalty, make a second commitment’, a itr: 大叔命西鄙北鄙貳 於己 (Zuo 1.1); 晉信蠻夷而棄兄弟，其 執政貳也 (GY 5.8); b tr: 法不貳後王 (Xun 9); 為人臣者，無外交，不敢貳 君也 (Li 11). 貳èr, *nis, var. of二 [7.0].
Definitions: 1 ‘be double-minded (to), duplicitous; split loyalty, make a second commitment’, a itr: 大叔命西鄙北鄙貳於己 (Zuo 1.1); 晉信蠻夷而棄兄弟，其 執政貳也 (GY 5.8); b tr: 法不貳後王 (Xun 9); 為人臣者，無外交，不敢貳 君也 (Li 11). 貳èr, *nis, var. of二 [7.0].

Full Entry: 謁 yè, *ʔat, vn, ‘announce, proclaim; visit a superior’, a tr: 微君言，臣故將謁 之 (HFei 36); 吾欲有謁於主君 (SJ 43); b itr: 未嘗得拜謁於前也 (SJ 105); c pseudo-tr2: 其父竊羊而謁之上 (HFei 49).
Definitions: ‘announce, proclaim; visit a superior’, a tr: 微君言，臣故將謁 之 (HFei 36); 吾欲有謁於主君 (SJ 43); b itr: 未嘗得拜謁於前也 (SJ 105); c pseudo-tr2: 其父竊羊而謁之上 (HFei 49).

Full Entry: 饑 jī, *kəi, nc, ‘starvation, hunger, famine’: 數奪民時，大饑乃來 (Lü 26.3).
Definitions: ‘starvation, hunger, famine’: 數奪民時，大饑乃來 (Lü 26.3).

Full Entry: 宣 xuān, *swan, vi, 1 ‘be perspicuous, lucid’, a itr: 君人者，宣則直言至矣 (Xun 21); 繼文之業，而信宣於諸侯 (Zuo 5.25); b caus ‘[make clear >] spread, proclaim, propagate’: 文王欲伐崇，先 宣言曰 (SY 15); 為民者宣之使言 (GY 1.3); 2 np, ‘Perspicuous’, a posth. name: 周 宣王殺其臣杜伯而不辜 (Mo 31).
Definitions: 1 ‘be perspicuous, lucid’, a itr: 君人者，宣則直言至矣(Xun 21); 繼文之業，而信宣於諸侯 (Zuo 5.25); b caus ‘[make clear >] spread, proclaim, propagate’: 文王欲伐崇，先 宣言曰 (SY 15); 為民者宣之使言 (GY 1.3); 2 np, ‘Perspicuous’, a posth. name: 周 宣王殺其臣杜伯而不辜 (Mo 31).

Full Entry: 辜 gū,*kâ,nc,1‘guilt;crime’:天乎，無 辜， 吾不弒君(GYang 7.6); 弛罪廢 法，而伏其辜 (HSWZ 2); 2 vi, ‘be guilty’, a itr: 周宣王殺其臣杜伯而不辜 (Mo 8); b caus, ‘disgrace’: 朽者揚其灰，未朽者 辜其尸 (SY 11); c mod: 至殺不辜人也 (Mo 17).
Definitions: 1‘guilt;crime’:天乎，無 辜， 吾不弒君 (GYang 7.6); 弛罪廢 法，而伏其辜 (HSWZ 2); 2 vi, ‘be guilty’, a itr: 周宣王殺其臣杜伯而不辜 (Mo 8); b caus, ‘disgrace’: 朽者揚其灰，未朽者 辜其尸 (SY 11); c mod: 至殺不辜人也(Mo 17).

Full Entry: 述 shù, *m-lut, vn, ‘follow, proceed; pass on, hand down’, a tr: 子如不言，則 小子何述焉 (LY 17.16); 父作之，子述 之 (Li 31); b itr: 述而不作，信而好古 (LY 7.1).
Definitions: ‘follow, proceed; pass on, hand down’, a tr: 子如不言，則 小子何述焉 (LY 17.16); 父作之，子述 之 (Li 31); b itr: 述而不作，信而好古 (LY 7.1).

Full Entry: 頌 sòng, *s-loŋh, nc, ‘hymn’: 右國頌(Guan 1).
Definitions: ‘hymn’: 右國頌(Guan 1).

Full Entry: 桃 táo, *lâu, nc, ‘peach’: 竊其桃李 (Mo 17).
Definitions: ‘peach’: 竊其桃李 (Mo 17).

Full Entry: 遂 suì, *s-jus, vi, 1 ‘go ahead, progress; succeed’, a itr: 功成名遂， 名譽不可虛 假 (Mo 2); b caus: 遂其賢良，順民所喜 (Lü 8.3); 遂賢良，舉長大 (Li 6); cf. 隨 [170.13]; 2 conj, ‘thereupon, then’: 遂為母 子如初 (Zuo 1.1); 孔子遂行 (SJ 47); cf. 16.3. Dist. 逐 [162.7].
Definitions: 1 ‘go ahead, progress; succeed’, a itr: 功成名遂， 名譽不可虛 假 (Mo 2); b caus: 遂其賢良，順民所喜 (Lü 8.3); 遂賢良，舉長大 (Li 6); cf. 隨 [170.13]; 2 conj, ‘thereupon, then’: 遂為母 子如初 (Zuo 1.1); 孔子遂行(SJ 47); cf. 16.3. Dist. 逐 [162.7].

Full Entry: 濟 jì, *tsəî , vi, 1 ‘ford, cross (a river); arrive at a goal, succeed’: a itr: 宋人既成 列，楚人未既濟 (Zuo 5.22); 昔我先君 駒王西討濟於河 (Li 4); 事雖大，必濟 (Zuo 8.9); b caus: 子產聽鄭國之政，以 其乘輿濟人於溱洧 (Meng 4B2); 開其 兌，濟其事，終身不救 (Lao 52); c pseudo-tr: 濟河而西 (Li 19).
Definitions: 1 ‘ford, cross (a river); arrive at a goal, succeed’: a itr: 宋人既成 列，楚人未既濟 (Zuo 5.22); 昔我先君 駒王西討濟於河 (Li 4); 事雖大，必濟 (Zuo 8.9); b caus: 子產聽鄭國之政，以 其乘輿濟人於溱洧 (Meng 4B2); 開其 兌，濟其事，終身不救 (Lao 52); c pseudo-tr: 濟河而西 (Li 19).

Full Entry: 縱 zòng, *tsoŋh, conj, ‘even if, even though’: 縱子忘之，山川鬼神其忘諸 乎 (Zuo 11.1). Cf. 16.2.
Definitions: ‘even if, even though’: 縱子忘之，山川鬼神其忘諸 乎(Zuo 11.1). Cf. 16.2.

Full Entry: 悔 huǐ, *hməĥ , vn, 1 ‘regret, repent’, a tr: 君必悔之 (Zuo 5.5); 太甲悔過 (Meng 5A6); 寡人雖死，亦無悔焉 (Zuo 1.3); b itr: 雖悔無及矣 (SY 3); 2 nc, ‘remorse’: 悔 吝者，懮虞之象也 (Yi 7).
Definitions: 1 ‘regret, repent’, a tr: 君必悔之 (Zuo 5.5); 太甲悔過(Meng 5A6); 寡人雖死，亦無悔焉 (Zuo 1.3); b itr: 雖悔無及矣 (SY 3); 2 nc, ‘remorse’: 悔 吝者，懮虞之象也 (Yi 7).

Full Entry: 材 cái, *dzə,̂ nc, ‘material, (natural) resources’: 雖楚有材，晉實用之 (Zuo 9.26).
Definitions: ‘material, (natural) resources’: 雖楚有材，晉實用之(Zuo 9.26).

Full Entry: 縣 xiàn, *gwêns, nc, 1 ‘district, county’: 雖與之縣，不亦可乎 (Zuo 10.28); 2 vi, ‘be a district’, caus: 文王以為令尹，實縣 申息 (Zuo 12.17).
Definitions: 1 ‘district, county’: 雖與之縣，不亦可乎 (Zuo 10.28); 2 vi, ‘be a district’, caus: 文王以為令尹，實縣 申息 (Zuo 12.17).

Full Entry: 況 kuàng, *hwaŋh, vn, ‘compare with, be equal to’, a itr: 成名況乎諸侯 (Xun 6); typically in rhetorical questions: 臣猶知 之，況於君乎 (SJ 39); b tr: 臣猶知 之，而況君乎(GY 10.1).
Definitions: ‘compare with, be equal to’, a itr: 成名況乎諸侯 (Xun 6); typically in rhetorical questions: 臣猶知 之，況於君乎 (SJ 39); b tr: 臣猶知 之，而況君乎 (GY 10.1).

Full Entry: 圍 wéi,*wəi,vtr,‘encircle,laysiegeto’,a tr: 王怒，遂圍蕭(Zuo 7.12); b pass: 寡人 一城圍，食不甘味，臥不便席(ZGC 5.10); c mod: 曷為久居此圍城之中而不 去也 (ZGC 20.13).
Definitions: ‘encircle,laysiegeto’,a tr: 王怒，遂圍蕭 (Zuo 7.12); b pass: 寡人 一城圍，食不甘味，臥不便席 (ZGC 5.10); c mod: 曷為久居此圍城之中而不 去也 (ZGC 20.13).

Full Entry: 蕭 Xiāo, *siû, np, a polity: 王怒，遂圍 蕭 (Zuo 7.12). Note: 蕭 was a small dependency of Song 宋, ruled by the Zi 子clan; it was annihilated by Chu 楚 in 597 bc.
Definitions: a polity: 王怒，遂圍 蕭 (Zuo 7.12). Note: 蕭 was a small dependency of Song 宋, ruled by the Zi 子clan; it was annihilated by Chu 楚 in 597 bc.

Full Entry: 掌 zhǎng, *taŋʔ, nc, ‘palm of the hand’: 及生，有文在掌曰友，遂以名 之 (SJ 33).
Definitions: ‘palm of the hand’: 及生，有文在掌曰友，遂以名 之(SJ 33).

Full Entry: 拜 bài, *prêts, vn, 1 ‘bow (before)’, a itr: 武王又再拜稽首，乃出 (SJ 4); 敵者不 在，拜於其室 (Li 13); b tr: 不得受於其 家，則往拜其門 (Meng 3B7); 2 adv: 大 夫親賜士，士拜受 (Li 13).
Definitions: 1 ‘bow (before)’, a itr: 武王又再拜稽首，乃出 (SJ 4); 敵者不 在，拜於其室 (Li 13); b tr: 不得受於其 家，則往拜其門 (Meng 3B7); 2 adv: 大 夫親賜士，士拜受 (Li 13).

Full Entry: 首 shǒu, *lhuʔ, nc, ‘head’: 周公拂其首 (SY 3.6); fig. ‘leader’: 成者為首，不成者 為尾 (Zhuang 29); fig. ‘first’: 賦大明之首 章 (Zuo 10.1).
Definitions: ‘head’: 周公拂其首 (SY 3.6); fig. ‘leader’: 成者為首，不成者 為尾 (Zhuang 29); fig. ‘first’: 賦大明之首 章 (Zuo 10.1).

Full Entry: 鄙 bǐ, *prəʔ , vst, ‘be shabby, mean, lowly’, a itr: 肉食者鄙，未能遠謀 (Zuo 3.10); b caus: 過我而不假道，鄙我也(Zuo 7.14); 易初本迪兮， 君子所鄙 (ChuC 4); c mod: 吾少也賤，故多能鄙事 (LY 9.6).
Definitions: ‘be shabby, mean, lowly’, a itr: 肉食者鄙，未能遠謀(Zuo 3.10); b caus: 過我而不假道，鄙我也 (Zuo 7.14); 易初本迪兮， 君子所鄙 (ChuC 4); c mod: 吾少也賤，故多能鄙事 (LY 9.6).

Full Entry: 處 chǔ, *k-hlaʔ, vi, ‘reside, dwell’, a itr: 地辟舉則民留處(Guan 1); 吾不忍 見，以是野處也 (XX 7.1); b caus, ‘place, put into place’: 早處之，使知其極 (GY 7.6); 此非吾所以居處子也 (LNZ 1.11): ‘treat’: 何以處我 (Li 4); c pseudo-tr: 齊人 有一妻一妾而處室者 (Meng 4B33); d mod: 聖王不作，諸侯放恣，處士橫議 (Meng 3B9). Syn. 居 [44.5].
Definitions: ‘reside, dwell’, a itr: 地辟舉則民留處 (Guan 1); 吾不忍見，以是野處也 (XX 7.1); b caus, ‘place, put into place’: 早處之，使知其極 (GY 7.6); 此非吾所以居處子也 (LNZ 1.11): ‘treat’: 何以處我 (Li 4); c pseudo-tr: 齊人有一妻一妾而處室者 (Meng 4B33); d mod: 聖王不作，諸侯放恣，處士橫議 (Meng 3B9). Syn. 居 [44.5].

Full Entry: 處 chù, *k-hlah, nc [< preceding], ‘place, residence’: 重徙則死處而無二慮 (Lü 26.3); 處雖闢， 行中正 (SJ 47). Syn. 所 [63.4].
Definitions: ‘place, residence’: 重徙則死處而無二慮 (Lü 26.3); 處雖闢， 行中正 (SJ 47). Syn. 所 [63.4].

Full Entry: 答 dá, *tûp, vn, 1 ‘answer, respond (to)’, a itr: 夫子不答(LY 14.5); b tr: 於答是也 何有 (Meng 6B1); 答之曰 (CQFL 1); 2 nc, ‘answer’: 今者吾忘吾答，因失吾問 (Zhuang 23). Ant. 問 [30.8]; cf. 對 [41.11].
Definitions: 1 ‘answer, respond (to)’, a itr: 夫子不答 (LY 14.5); b tr: 於答是也 何有 (Meng 6B1); 答之曰 (CQFL 1); 2 nc, ‘answer’: 今者吾忘吾答，因失吾問 (Zhuang 23). Ant. 問[30.8]; cf. 對 [41.11].

Full Entry: 屏 bǐng,*peŋʔ/h, vn, ‘shield’, tr: 屏王之 耳目，使不聰明(Zuo 10.27).
Definitions: ‘shield’, tr: 屏王之 耳目，使不聰明 (Zuo 10.27).

Full Entry: 聰 cōng, *tshôŋ, vst,‘have acute hearing’, a itr: 目明而耳聰 (Xun 23); 視不明， 聽 不聰， 行不正， 不知哀， 君子病之 (Li 21); b comp: 聽而精之，莫聰於耳 (HNan 10); c mod: 是以聰耳明目相與視 聽乎 (Mo 3).
Definitions: ‘have acute hearing’, a itr: 目明而耳聰 (Xun 23); 視不明， 聽 不聰， 行不正， 不知哀， 君子病之 (Li 21); b comp: 聽而精之，莫聰於耳 (HNan 10); c mod: 是以聰耳明目相與視 聽乎 (Mo 3).

Full Entry: 樸 pǔ, *phrôk, vi, ‘be natural, raw; plain, simple, unsophisticated’, a itr: 其民 愚而樸，少私而寡欲(Zhuang 20); 民農則樸，樸則易用 (Lü 26.3); b mod: 若馭樸馬，若養赤子 (Xun 13). Syn. 素 [120.4]; 質 [154.8]; ant. 文 [67.0].
Definitions: ‘be natural, raw; plain, simple, unsophisticated’, a itr: 其民 愚而樸，少私而寡欲 (Zhuang 20); 民農則樸，樸則易用 (Lü 26.3); b mod: 若馭樸馬，若養赤子 (Xun 13). Syn. 素 [120.4]; 質 [154.8]; ant. 文 [67.0].

Full Entry: 厚 hòu, *gôʔ, vst, ‘be thick; rich, substantial, heavy’, a itr: 不臨深谿，不知地 之厚也 (Xun 1); 其流長矣，其溫厚矣(Xun 4); b caus, ‘enrich’: 家務相益，不 務厚國 (HFei 6); ‘treat as important’: 其 所厚者薄 (Li 42); 有知其厚厚而薄薄 (CQFL 1); c comp: 德莫厚焉，刑莫威焉 (Zuo 5.15); d mod: 或以厚葬久喪以為仁 也 (Mo 25). Ant. 薄 [140.13].
Definitions: ‘be thick; rich, substantial, heavy’, a itr: 不臨深谿，不知地 之厚也 (Xun 1); 其流長矣，其溫厚矣 (Xun 4); b caus, ‘enrich’: 家務相益，不 務厚國 (HFei 6); ‘treat as important’: 其 所厚者薄 (Li 42); 有知其厚厚而薄薄(CQFL 1); c comp: 德莫厚焉，刑莫威焉 (Zuo 5.15); d mod: 或以厚葬久喪以為仁 也 (Mo 25). Ant. 薄 [140.13].

Full Entry: 偽 wèi, *ŋwaih, vtr, ‘contrive, forge, fake; pretend to’, 可學而能，可事而成 之在人者謂之偽 (Xun 17); a tr: 我偽逃楚 (Zuo 8.16); 辭，偽有疾 (Zuo 11.9); b pass: 其善者偽也(Xun 23).
Definitions: ‘contrive, forge, fake; pretend to’, 可學而能，可事而成之在人者謂之偽 (Xun 17); a tr: 我偽逃 楚 (Zuo 8.16); 辭，偽有疾 (Zuo 11.9); b pass: 其善者偽也 (Xun 23).

Full Entry: 封 fēng, *poŋ, vtr, ‘cover with a mound; enfeoff ’: a tr: 制其畿方千里，而封樹之 (ZL 18); 今不封蔡 (Zuo 10.13); 遂封唐叔 虞於晉 (SY 1); b pass: 蔡不封矣 (Zuo 10.13); 大公封於營丘 (Li 3).
Definitions: ‘cover with a mound; enfeoff ’: a tr: 制其畿方千里，而封樹之 (ZL 18); 今不封蔡 (Zuo 10.13); 遂封唐叔 虞於晉(SY 1); b pass: 蔡不封矣 (Zuo 10.13); 大公封於營丘 (Li 3).

Full Entry: 遺 yí, *wi, vtr, 1 ‘neglect, lose, leave behind’, a tr: 齊桓公飲酒醉，遺其冠 (HFei 37); b mod, ‘lost, left behind; bequeathed’: 衛之遺民男女七百有三十 人 (Zuo 4.2); 不聞先王之遺言，不知學 問之大也(Xun 1); 2 nc, ‘lost goods’: 塗不 拾遺 (SJ 47).
Definitions: 1 ‘neglect, lose, leave behind’, a tr: 齊桓公飲酒醉，遺其冠 (HFei 37); b mod, ‘lost, left behind; bequeathed’: 衛之遺民男女七百有三十 人 (Zuo 4.2); 不聞先王之遺言，不知學 問之大也(Xun 1); 2 nc, ‘lost goods’: 塗不 拾遺 (SJ 47).

Full Entry: 遺 wèi, *wih, vn [< preceding] ‘present, bequeath; send’, a tr2: 巫臣自晉遺二子書 (Zuo 8.7); b only Oi: 故書其言以遺後世 (Mo 17); 於是選齊國中女子好者八十 人...遺魯君 (SJ 47); 小人有母，...未 嘗 君 之 羹 ，請以遺之 (Zuo 1.1).
Definitions: ‘present, bequeath; send’, a tr2: 巫臣自晉遺二子書 (Zuo 8.7); b only Oi: 故書其言以遺後世 (Mo 17); 於是選齊國中女子好者八十 人...遺魯君 (SJ 47); 小人有母，...未 嘗 君 之羹 ，請以遺之 (Zuo 1.1).

Full Entry: 陷 xiàn, *grəm̂ s, vi, ‘fall into’, a itr: 臣聞 聖王公之先封者，遺後之人法，使無 陷於惡 (GY 4.3); 若以邪臨民，陷而不 振 (GY 4.15); b caus,‘bring to fall’: 三長史皆害湯， 欲陷之 (SJ 122); 貪利以陷其 身(YTL 57).
Definitions: ‘fall into’, a itr: 臣聞 聖王公之先封者，遺後之人法，使無 陷於惡 (GY 4.3); 若以邪臨民，陷而不 振 (GY 4.15); b caus,‘bring to fall’: 三長史皆害湯， 欲陷之 (SJ 122); 貪利以陷其 身(YTL 57).

Full Entry: 鄉 xiāng,*haŋ,nc,‘community,district’: 何不嘗入一鄉一里而問之 (Mo 31).
Definitions: ‘community,district’: 何不嘗入一鄉一里而問之 (Mo 31).

Full Entry: 鄉 xiàng, *haŋh, vn,‘turn toward, face’, a tr: 君不鄉道，不志於仁，而求富 之，是富桀也 (Meng 6B9); b itr: 鄉則不若，偝則謾之，是人之二必窮也 (Xun 3.5).
Definitions: ‘turn toward, face’, a tr: 君不鄉道，不志於仁，而求富之，是富桀也 (Meng 6B9); b itr: 鄉則不 若，偝則謾之，是人之二必窮也 (Xun 3.5).

Full Entry: 耨 nòu, *nûk/nôkh, nc, 1 ‘hoe’: 耨柄 尺，此其度也，其耨六寸，所以間稼 也 (Lü 26.4); 耒耨之利，以教天下 (Yi 8); 2 vn, ‘weed’, a itr: 彼奪其民時，使不 得耕耨，以養其父母(Meng 1A5); b tr: 耕之耰之，鉏之耨之 (SJ 128); 故人情者，聖王之田也，脩禮以耕之，陳義 以種之，講學以耨之(Li 9).
Definitions: 1 ‘hoe’: 耨柄 尺，此其度也，其耨六寸，所以間稼 也(Lü 26.4); 耒耨之利，以教天下 (Yi 8); 2 vn, ‘weed’, a itr: 彼奪其民時，使不 得耕耨，以養其父母 (Meng 1A5); b tr: 耕之耰之，鉏之耨之 (SJ 128); 故人情 者，聖王之田也，脩禮以耕之，陳義 以種之，講學以耨之 (Li 9).

Full Entry: 養 yaňg,*jaŋʔ,vtr,1‘feed,raise,lookafter’, a tr: 父能生之，不能養之 (Xun 19); 養桑 麻， 育六畜也 (Guan 1.4); b pass: 五十養 於鄉，六十養於國，七十養於學 (Li 5); syn. 育[130.4]; 2 nc,‘nourishment, food’: 不 事力而養足 (HFei 49).
Definitions: 1‘feed,raise,lookafter’, a tr: 父能生之，不能養之 (Xun 19); 養桑 麻， 育六畜也 (Guan 1.4); b pass: 五十養 於鄉，六十養於國，七十養於學 (Li 5); syn. 育 [130.4]; 2 nc,‘nourishment, food’: 不 事力而養足 (HFei 49).

Full Entry: 饜 yàn, *ʔems, vn, ‘eat one’s fill; be satisfied (with), content’, a itr: 不奪不饜 (Meng 1A1); b tr: 良人出，則必饜酒肉 而後反 (Meng 4B33).
Definitions: ‘eat one’s fill; be satisfied (with), content’, a itr: 不奪不饜 (Meng 1A1); b tr: 良人出，則必饜酒肉 而後反 (Meng 4B33).

Full Entry: 辱 rù,*nok,vtr,1‘disgrace,humiliate’,a tr: 使於四方，不辱君命 (LY 13.20); b pass: 南辱於楚 (Meng 1A5); 2 nc, ‘shame, disgrace’: 衣食足則知榮辱 (Guan 1).
Definitions: 1‘disgrace,humiliate’,a tr: 使於四方，不辱君命 (LY 13.20); b pass: 南辱於楚 (Meng 1A5); 2 nc, ‘shame, disgrace’: 衣食足則知榮辱 (Guan 1).

Full Entry: 囿 yòu, *wəkh, nc, ‘park, reserve’: 棄田 以為園囿，使民不得衣食 (Meng 3B9). Syn. 圃 [31.7], 園 [31.10].
Definitions: ‘park, reserve’: 棄田 以為園囿，使民不得衣食 (Meng 3B9). Syn. 圃 [31.7], 園 [31.10].

Full Entry: 不肖 bùxiào, *pə-siauh, vst, ‘be unworthy, unfit, incapable’, a category for judging people, a itr: 不肖而不肯事賢 (Xun 5); b comp: 嬰最不肖，故宜使楚耳 (SY 12); c mod: 不肖者使不肖主 (SY 12). Ant. 賢 [154.8].
Definitions: ‘be unworthy, unfit, incapable’, a category for judging people, a itr: 不肖而不肯事賢 (Xun 5); b comp: 嬰最不肖，故宜使楚耳 (SY 12); c mod: 不肖者使不肖主 (SY 12). Ant. 賢 [154.8].

Full Entry: 竹 zhú, *truk, nc, ‘bamboo’: 南山有 竹，弗揉自直，斬而射之，通於犀革 (SY 3); 著於竹帛，鏤於金石 (Wen 2); by metonymy, instruments made of bamboo: 金石絲竹，樂之器也 (Li 19).
Definitions: ‘bamboo’: 南山有 竹，弗揉自直，斬而射之，通於犀革(SY 3); 著於竹帛，鏤於金石 (Wen 2); by metonymy, instruments made of bamboo: 金石絲竹，樂之器也 (Li 19).

Full Entry: 悅/說 yuè, *lot, vi, ‘be pleased, content; pleasing’, a itr: 若時雨降，民大悅 (Meng 3B5); 孔子不悅於魯衛 (Meng 5A8); 學而時習之，不亦說乎 (LY 1.1); b caus: 民致行己以說其上矣 (Li 33); 夫欲 得之君，不可說以利 (ZGC 31.2); c pseudo-tr, ‘take pleasure in’: 不知說 生，不知惡死(Zhuang 6); 王后悅其 狀，高其知 (ZGC 7.5).
Definitions: ‘be pleased, content; pleasing’, a itr: 若時雨降，民大悅(Meng 3B5); 孔子不悅於魯衛 (Meng 5A8); 學而時習之，不亦說乎 (LY 1.1); b caus: 民致行己以說其上矣 (Li 33); 夫欲 得之君，不可說以利 (ZGC 31.2); c pseudo-tr, ‘take pleasure in’: 不知說 生，不知惡死 (Zhuang 6); 王后悅其 狀，高其知 (ZGC 7.5).

Full Entry: 稱 chēng, *thəŋ, vtr, ‘call, name (s.o.); praise, acclaim’, a tr: 讓國餓死，天下稱 之 (SJ 130); b tr with C: 邦君之妻，君稱 之曰夫人，夫人自稱曰小童 (LY 16.14); c pass: 君子疾沒世而名不稱焉 (LY 15.20); d pass with C: 稱鄭伯，譏失教也 (Zuo 1.1); 夫舉事者或為善而不稱善， 或不善而稱善者，何 (XY 5).
Definitions: ‘call, name (s.o.); praise, acclaim’, a tr: 讓國餓死，天下稱 之 (SJ 130); b tr with C: 邦君之妻，君稱 之曰夫人，夫人自稱曰小童 (LY 16.14); c pass: 君子疾沒世而名不稱焉 (LY 15.20); d pass with C: 稱鄭伯，譏失教也 (Zuo 1.1); 夫舉事者或為善而不稱善， 或不善而稱善者，何(XY 5).

Full Entry: 俗 sú, *s-lok, nc, ‘custom, common practice, tradition, usage’: 夫論至德者，不和 於俗，成大功者，不謀於眾(ZGC 19.4).
Definitions: ‘custom, common practice, tradition, usage’: 夫論至德者，不和 於俗，成大功者，不謀於眾 (ZGC 19.4).

Full Entry: 融融 róngróng, *luŋ-luŋ, vi (?), ‘be united, harmonize’, hapax, itr: 大隧之 中，其樂也融融 (Zuo 1.1).
Definitions: ‘be united, harmonize’, hapax, itr: 大隧之 中，其樂也融融 (Zuo 1.1).
BS_Gloss: hot air, steam, heat / hot air, steam, heat

Full Entry: 慍 yùn, *ʔuns, vi, ‘be angry, annoyed’, a itr: 人不知而不慍，不亦君子乎 (LY 1.1); b pseudo-tr: 然亦慍知伯 (SJ 43); c mod: 三已之，無慍色 (LY 5.19). Syn. 怒 [61.5].
Definitions: ‘be angry, annoyed’, a itr: 人不知而不慍，不亦君子乎(LY 1.1); b pseudo-tr: 然亦慍知伯 (SJ 43); c mod: 三已之，無慍色 (LY 5.19). Syn. 怒 [61.5].

Full Entry: 退 tuì, *thûs, vn, ‘retire, withdraw, retreat (from)’, a itr: 問其名居，不告而 退 (Zuo 7.2); 鯉退而學詩 (LY 16.13); b tr: 冉子退朝 (LY 13.14).
Definitions: ‘retire, withdraw, retreat (from)’, a itr: 問其名居，不告而退 (Zuo 7.2); 鯉退而學詩 (LY 16.13); b tr: 冉子退朝 (LY 13.14).

Full Entry: 彌 mí, *me, adv, ‘ increasingly, more’, expressing the comparative of vst: 仰之彌 高，鑽之彌堅 (LY 9.11); 其虧彌甚者 也，其尊彌薄 (Lü 2.2). Cf. Box 24.
Definitions: ‘ increasingly, more’, expressing the comparative of vst: 仰之彌 高，鑽之彌堅 (LY 9.11); 其虧彌甚者 也，其尊彌薄 (Lü 2.2). Cf. Box 24.

Full Entry: 即/卽 jí, *tsit, vn, 1 ‘approach, arrive’, tr: 望之儼然，即之也溫 (LY 19.9); 將即 席，容毋怍 (Li 1); esp. ‘accede to the throne, assume an office’: 及莊公即 位，為之請制 (Zuo 1.1); 獻公即位 (SJ 5); 2 conj, ‘if, when’, a ini: 即戎寇至，傳 鼓相告 (Lü 22.3); b med: 吾即沒，若必 師之 (SJ 47).
Definitions: 1 ‘approach, arrive’, tr: 望之儼然，即之也溫 (LY 19.9); 將即 席，容毋怍 (Li 1); esp. ‘accede to the throne, assume an office’: 及莊公即 位，為之請制 (Zuo 1.1); 獻公即位 (SJ 5); 2 conj, ‘if, when’, a ini: 即戎寇至，傳 鼓相告 (Lü 22.3); b med: 吾即沒，若必 師之 (SJ 47).

Full Entry: 云 yún, *wən, vn, 1 ‘say, state (it)’, introduces quotations, tr: 故鼎銘云 (SJ 47); syn. 曰 [73.0]; 2 pt, marks the end of a quotation: 汝安知魚樂云者 (Zhuang 17). Cf. Box 23.
Definitions: 1 ‘say, state (it)’, introduces quotations, tr: 故鼎銘云(SJ 47); syn. 曰 [73.0]; 2 pt, marks the end of a quotation: 汝安知魚樂云者 (Zhuang 17). Cf. Box 23.

Full Entry: 踰 yú, *lo, vn, ‘pass over, transgress, go beyond, exceed’, a tr: 七十而從心所 欲，不踰矩 (LY 2.4); b itr: 公乃走踰於 北牆 (HFei 14); 信事，則不失天時，百 姓不踰(HFei 32).
Definitions: ‘pass over, transgress, go beyond, exceed’, a tr: 七十而從心所 欲，不踰矩 (LY 2.4); b itr: 公乃走踰於 北牆(HFei 14); 信事，則不失天時，百 姓不踰 (HFei 32).

Full Entry: 矩 jǔ, *kwaʔ, nc,‘right measure’:七十而 從心所欲，不踰矩 (LY 2.4).
Definitions: ‘right measure’:七十而 從心所欲，不踰矩 (LY 2.4).

Full Entry: 辟 bì, *bek, nc, ‘law, rule’: 士則學習法令辟禁 (SJ 6).
Definitions: ‘law, rule’: 士則學習法令辟禁 (SJ 6).

Full Entry: 辟/闢 pì, *bek, vtr, ‘open; develop (land)’, a tr: 今世主欲辟地治民而不審 數 (SJS 6); 將闢田野，實倉廩 (Xun 10); b pass: 上令行而荒草闢 (SJS 8); 晨 往，寢門闢矣 (Zuo 7.2).
Definitions: ‘open; develop (land)’, a tr: 今世主欲辟地治民而不審 數(SJS 6); 將闢田野，實倉廩 (Xun 10); b pass: 上令行而荒草闢 (SJS 8); 晨 往，寢門闢矣 (Zuo 7.2).

Full Entry: 計 jì, *kîh, vn, 1 ‘calculate, reckon’, a tr: 量地而立國，計利而畜民 (Xun 10); 誰 習計會 (ZGC 11.1); b itr: 臣竊計(ZGC 11.1); 君子計而後行，二三子其計乎 (SY 9); 2 nc, ‘plan, proposal’: 誰為此計者 乎 (SJ 79).
Definitions: 1 ‘calculate, reckon’, a tr: 量地而立國，計利而畜民(Xun 10); 誰 習計會 (ZGC 11.1); b itr: 臣竊計 (ZGC 11.1); 君子計而後行，二三子其計乎 (SY 9); 2 nc, ‘plan, proposal’: 誰為此計者 乎 (SJ 79).

Full Entry: 備 bèi, *brəks, nc, 1 ‘provision, equipment; preparations’: 兵甲器備各便其用 (SJS 1); 2 vn, ‘provide (for), prepare, take precautions (against)’, a tr: 行善而備敗 (GY 1.3); 譬之若修兵者，以備寇也 (Lü 1.2); b itr: 夫姦必知則備 (HFei 46).
Definitions: 1 ‘provision, equipment; preparations’: 兵甲器備各便其用 (SJS 1); 2 vn, ‘provide (for), prepare, take precautions (against)’, a tr: 行善而備敗 (GY 1.3); 譬之若修兵者，以備寇也 (Lü 1.2); b itr: 夫姦必知則備 (HFei 46).

Full Entry: 備 bèi, *brəks, vi, 1 ‘be complete’, a itr: 萬物皆備於我矣(Meng 7A4); 不恭祖舊 則孝悌不備 (Guan 1); b caus: 故求備 物，不求豐大 (GY 18.2). Syn. 具 [12.6].
Definitions: 1 ‘be complete’, a itr: 萬物皆備於我矣 (Meng 7A4); 不恭祖舊 則孝悌不備 (Guan 1); b caus: 故求備 物，不求豐大 (GY 18.2). Syn. 具 [12.6].

Full Entry: 童 tóng, *dôŋ, nc, ‘boy, child’: 孩提之 童，無不知愛其親者 (Meng 7A15). Cf. 子 [39.0].
Definitions: ‘boy, child’: 孩提之 童，無不知愛其親者 (Meng 7A15). Cf. 子 [39.0].

Full Entry: 畜 xù, *huk, vtr, ‘breed, rear’, a tr: 仰足 以事父母，俯足以畜妻子 (Meng 1A7); 子產使校人畜之池 (Meng 5A1); b pass: 安職則畜，不安職則棄 (Xun 9); c mod: 仲尼之畜狗死 (Li 4).
Definitions: ‘breed, rear’, a tr: 仰足 以事父母，俯足以畜妻子 (Meng 1A7); 子產使校人畜之池 (Meng 5A1); b pass: 安職則畜，不安職則棄 (Xun 9); c mod: 仲尼之畜狗死 (Li 4).
